bundle_et.properties.hint.mine: Move near the \uf8c4 copper ore and [accent]tap[] it to mine manually.
bundle_et.properties.hint.depositItems: To transfer items, drag from your ship to the core.
bundle_et.properties.hint.respawn: To respawn as a ship, press [accent][[V][].
bundle_et.properties.hint.respawn.mobile: You have switched control to a unit/structure. To respawn as a ship, [accent]tap the avatar in the top left.[]
bundle_et.properties.hint.desktopPause: Press [accent][[Space][] to pause and unpause the game.
bundle_et.properties.hint.placeDrill: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and click on a copper patch to place it.
bundle_et.properties.hint.placeDrill.mobile: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and tap on a copper patch to place it.\n\nPress the \ue800 [accent]checkmark[] at the bottom right to confirm.
bundle_et.properties.hint.placeConveyor:
Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a  [accent]Conveyor[] from the  [accent]Distribution[] tab.

Click and drag to place multiple conveyors.
[accent]Scroll[] to rotate.
bundle_et.properties.hint.placeConveyor.mobile: Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a \uf896 [accent]Conveyor[] from the \ue814 [accent]Distribution[] tab.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to place multiple conveyors.
bundle_et.properties.hint.placeTurret:
Place  [accent]Turrets[] to defend your base from enemies.

Turrets require ammo - in this case, copper.
Use conveyors and drills to supply them.
bundle_et.properties.hint.breaking.mobile: Activate the \ue817 [accent]hammer[] in the bottom right and tap to break blocks.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to break in a selection.
bundle_et.properties.hint.blockInfo: View information of a block by selecting it in the [accent]build menu[], then selecting the [accent][[?][] button at the right.
bundle_et.properties.hint.derelict: [accent]Derelict[] structures are broken remnants of old bases that no longer function.\n\nThese structures can be [accent]deconstructed[] for resources.
bundle_et.properties.hint.research: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button to research new technology.
bundle_et.properties.hint.research.mobile: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[] to research new technology.
bundle_et.properties.hint.unitControl: Hold [accent][[L-ctrl][] and [accent]click[] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_et.properties.hint.unitControl.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_et.properties.hint.launch: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the bottom right.
bundle_et.properties.hint.launch.mobile: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[].
bundle_et.properties.hint.schematicSelect: Hold [accent][[F][] and drag to select blocks to copy and paste.\n\n[accent][[Middle Click][] to copy a single block type.
bundle_et.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind: Hold [accent][[L-Ctrl][] while dragging conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_et.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind.mobile: Enable \ue844 [accent]diagonal mode[] and drag conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_et.properties.hint.boost: Hold [accent][[L-Shift][] to fly over obstacles with your current unit.\n\nOnly a few ground units have boosters.
bundle_et.properties.hint.command: Press [accent][[G][] to command nearby units of [accent]similar type[] into formation.\n\nTo command ground units, you must first control another ground unit.
bundle_et.properties.hint.command.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] your unit to command nearby units into formation.
bundle_et.properties.hint.payloadPickup: Press [accent][[[] to pick up small blocks or units.
bundle_et.properties.hint.payloadPickup.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] a small block or unit to pick it up.
bundle_et.properties.hint.payloadDrop.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] an empty location to drop a payload there.
bundle_et.properties.hint.waveFire: [accent]Wave[] turrets with water as ammunition will automatically put out nearby fires.
bundle_et.properties.hint.generator: \uf879 [accent]Combustion Generators[] burn coal and transmit power to adjacent blocks.\n\nPower transmission range can be extended with \uf87f [accent]Power Nodes[].
bundle_et.properties.hint.guardian: [accent]Guardian[] units are armored. Weak ammo such as [accent]Copper[] and [accent]Lead[] is [scarlet]not effective[].\n\nUse higher tier turrets or \uf835 [accent]Graphite[] \uf861Duo/\uf859Salvo ammunition to take Guardians down.
bundle_et.properties.hint.coreUpgrade: Cores can be upgraded by [accent]placing higher-tier cores over them[].\n\nPlace a \uf868 [accent]Foundation[] core over the \uf869 [accent]Shard[] core. Make sure it is free from nearby obstructions.
bundle_et.properties.hint.presetLaunch: Gray [accent]landing zone sectors[], such as [accent]Frozen Forest[], can be launched to from anywhere. They do not require capture of nearby territory.\n\n[accent]Numbered sectors[], such as this one, are [accent]optional[].
bundle_et.properties.hint.presetDifficulty: This sector has a [scarlet]high enemy threat level[].\nLaunching to such sectors is [accent]not recommended[] without proper technology and preparation.
bundle_et.properties.hint.coreIncinerate: After the core is filled to capacity with an item, any extra items of that type it receives will be [accent]incinerated[].
bundle_et.properties.hint.coopCampaign: When playing the [accent]co-op campaign[], items that are produced in the current map will also be sent [accent]to your local sectors[].\n\nAny new research done by the host also carries over.
bundle_et.properties.item.copper.description: Peamine materjal, mida kasutatakse igat tüüpi konstruktsioonide ehitamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.item.copper.details: Copper. Abnormally abundant metal on Serpulo. Structurally weak unless reinforced.
bundle_et.properties.item.lead.description: Peamine materjal, mida kasutatakse vedelike transportimise konstruktsioonide ja elektroonikaga seotud konstruktsioonide ehitamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.item.lead.details: Dense. Inert. Extensively used in batteries.\nNote: Likely toxic to biological life forms. Not that there are many left here.
bundle_et.properties.item.metaglass.description: Ülitugev klaasiühend, mida kasutatakse vedelike transportimise ja hoiustamise konstruktsioonide ehitamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.item.graphite.description: Töödeldud süsinik, mida kasutatakse laskemoona tootmisel ja elektrilise isoleerainena.
bundle_et.properties.item.sand.description: Levinud materjal, mida kasutatakse metallurgias toorainena ja sulamite koostisena.
bundle_et.properties.item.coal.description: Kivistunud taimne mass, mis tekkis ammu enne spooride levimist. Kasutatakse kütusena ja teiste materjalide tootmisel.
bundle_et.properties.item.coal.details: Appears to be fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event.
bundle_et.properties.item.titanium.description: Haruldane ja imekerge metall, mida kasutatakse puuride, mehhaanide ja vedelike transportimise konstruktsioonide ehitamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.item.thorium.description: Tihke radioaktiivne metall, mida kasutatakse tuumkütusena ja tugevate konstruktsioonide ehitamisel.
bundle_et.properties.item.scrap.description: Vanaaegsete ehitiste ja mahajäetud väeüksuste jäänused, mis sisaldavad väheses koguses erinevaid metalle.
bundle_et.properties.item.scrap.details: Leftover remnants of old structures and units.
bundle_et.properties.item.silicon.description: Pooljuht, mida kasutatakse päikesepaneelides, keerukates elektroonikaseadmetes ja isejuhtivates rakketides.
bundle_et.properties.item.plastanium.description: Kerge plastiline materjal, mida kasutatakse täiustatud lendmehhaanide ja kildpommide valmistamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Peaaegu kaalutu materjal, mida kasutatakse keerukates elektroonikaseadmetes ja isetaastuvates tehnoloogiates.
bundle_et.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Täiustatud sulam, millel on ainulaadsed elektrilised omadused.
bundle_et.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Sünteetiline spooride kogum, mis on toodetud atmosfääris leiduvatest kontsentratsioonidest tööstustlikel eesmärkidel. Kasutatakse kütusena, tehisnafta tootmiseks ja lõhkeainete koostisosana.
bundle_et.properties.item.spore-pod.details: Spores. Likely a synthetic life form. Emit gases toxic to other biological life. Extremely invasive. Highly flammable in certain conditions.
bundle_et.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Pommides kasutatav ebastabiilne komponent, mis on sünteesitud spoorikobaratest ja teistest lenduvatest ühenditest. Kütusena kasutamine pole soovitatav.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.water.description: Kõige kasulikum vedelik, mida kasutatakse masinate jahutamiseks ja tööstuslike jäätmete töötlemisel.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.slag.description: Erinevate sulametallide segu. Võimalik eraldada koostisesse kuuluvateks mineraalideks või kasutada relvana, pihustades seda vaenlase väeüksustele.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.oil.description: Keerukate materjalide tootmisel kasutatav vedelik. Võimalik muundada söeks või kasutada relvana, pihustades seda vaenlase väeüksustele.
bundle_et.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Inertne mittesöövitav vedelik, mis saadakse veest ja titaanist. Suure soojusmahtuvusega. Kasutatakse masinate jahutamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.block.armored-conveyor.description: Transpordib ressursse sama kiiresti kui titaankonveier, kuid on soomuskattega ja vastupidavam. Võtab külgedelt sisendina vastu ainult konveierite väljundeid.
bundle_et.properties.block.illuminator.description: A small, compact, configurable light source. Requires power to function.
bundle_et.properties.block.multi-press.description: Grafiidipressi täiustatud versioon, mis kasutab vett ja energiat kiiremaks ja tõhusamaks töötlemiseks.
bundle_et.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Toodab räni, redutseerides liiva puhta söega.
bundle_et.properties.block.kiln.description: Sulatab liiva ja plii metaklaasiks. Väike energiatarve.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Sünteesib faaskangast radioaktiivsest tooriumist ja liivast. Tohutu energiatarve.
bundle_et.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Kombineerib titaaniumi, plii, räni ja vase voogsulamiks.
bundle_et.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Toodab krüovedelikku, segades kokku vee ja peene titaanpulbri. Hädavajalik tooriumreaktori toimimiseks.
bundle_et.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Purustab spoorikobaraid ja segab neid püratiidiga, et toota lõhkeainet.
bundle_et.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Segab söe, plii ja liiva tuleohtlikuks püratiidiks.
bundle_et.properties.block.melter.description: Sulatab vanametalli räbuks, mida saab kas edasi töödelda või kasutada pritskahurites.
bundle_et.properties.block.separator.description: Eraldab räbu selle koostisesse kuuluvateks mineraalideks. Väljastab jahenenud saadused.
bundle_et.properties.block.spore-press.description: Sünteesib naftat, surudes spoorikobaraid suure rõhu all.
bundle_et.properties.block.incinerator.description: Hävitab iga sellesse siseneva ressursi ja vedeliku.
bundle_et.properties.block.power-void.description: Nullib kogu energia. Olemas ainult mänguviisis "Liivakast".
bundle_et.properties.block.power-source.description: Väljastab piiramatult energiat. Olemas ainult mänguviisis "Liivakast".
bundle_et.properties.block.item-source.description: Väljastab piiramatult ressursse. Olemas ainult mänguviisis "Liivakast".
bundle_et.properties.block.item-void.description: Hävitab kõik ressursid. Olemas ainult mänguviisis "Liivakast".
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Väljastab piiramatult vedelikke. Olemas ainult mänguviisis "Liivakast".
bundle_et.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Odav kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nKasulik tuumiku ja kahurite kaitsmiseks esimeste lahingulainete ajal.
bundle_et.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Odav kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nKasulik tuumiku ja kahurite kaitsmiseks esimeste lahingulainete ajal.\nUlatub üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: Mõõdukalt tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nPakub keskmist kaitset vaenlaste eest.
bundle_et.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: Mõõdukalt tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nPakub keskmist kaitset vaenlaste eest.\nUlatub üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_et.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_et.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nPakub head kaitset vaenlaste eest.
bundle_et.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nPakub head kaitset vaenlaste eest.\nUlatub üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon, mis on kaetud erilise faaskangapõhise peegeldava ühendiga. Pakub kaitset peaaegu kõiki tüüpi kuulide ja mürskude eest.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon, mis on kaetud erilise faaskangapõhise peegeldava ühendiga. Pakub kaitset peaaegu kõiki tüüpi kuulide ja mürskude eest.\nUlatub üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Äärmiselt tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nKuulidega kokkupõrkel neelab energiat, vabastades seda suvalistel hetkedel.
bundle_et.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Äärmiselt tugev kaitsekonstruktsioon.\nKuulidega kokkupõrkel neelab energiat, vabastades seda suvalistel hetkedel.\nUlatub üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.door.description: Väike uks, mida saab avada ja sulgeda sellele vajutades.
bundle_et.properties.block.door-large.description: Suur uks, mida saab avada ja sulgeda sellele vajutades.\nUlatub üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.mender.description: Parandab perioodiliselt enda ümber olevaid konstruktsioone, hoides neid lahingulainete järel töökorras ja tervena. Ulatuse ja efektiivsuse parendamiseks on võimalik kasutada räni.
bundle_et.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Parandaja täiustatud versioon, mille mõjuala on suurem. Parandab enda ümber olevaid konstruktsioone. Ulatuse ja efektiivsuse parendamiseks on võimalik kasutada faaskangast.
bundle_et.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Suurendab enda ümber olevate konstruktsioonide kiirust. Ulatuse ja efektiivsuse parendamiseks on võimalik kasutada faaskangast.
bundle_et.properties.block.force-projector.description: Tekitab enda ümber kuusnurkse energiavälja, mis kaitseb ehitisi ja väeüksuseid. Liigse koormuse korral kuumeneb üle. Ülekuumenemise korral on võimalik kasutada jahutusvedelikke. Mõjuala suurendamiseks on võimalik kasutada faaskangast.
bundle_et.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Peaaegu nähtamatu miin, mis lõhkeb, kui vaenlane sellele astub.
bundle_et.properties.block.conveyor.description: Peamine vahend ressursside transportimiseks. Liigutab ressursse edasi ja hoiustab neid sobilikesse ehitistesse automaatselt. Pööratav.
bundle_et.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Täiustatud konveier, mis liigutab ressursse kiiremini kui tavaline konveier.
bundle_et.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_et.properties.block.junction.description: Toimib kui sild samal tasapinnal ristuvate konveierite vahel. Kasulik olukordades, kus kaks konveierit kannavad erinevaid ressursse erinevatesse kohtadesse.
bundle_et.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Spetsiaalne konveier, mis liigutab ressursse üle maastiku ja ehitiste kuni 3 bloki ulatuses.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Täiustatud konveier, mis kasutab energiat ressursside teleportimiseks järgmise samasuguse konveierini üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorteerib ressursse. Kui sisenev ressurss vastab valitud ressursile, siis liigub see otse edasi. Vastasel juhul väljastatakse ressurss vasakule või paremale.
bundle_et.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_et.properties.block.router.description: Jaotab ressursse kuni kolmes väljuvas suunas võrdselt. Kasulik olukordades, kus ressursse on vaja korraga saata mitmesse kohta.\n\n[scarlet]Ära kasuta neid tootmismasinate sisendite kõrval, kuna väljund ummistab sisendi.[]
bundle_et.properties.block.router.details: A necessary evil. Using next to production inputs is not advised, as they will get clogged by output.
bundle_et.properties.block.distributor.description: Täiustatud jaotur, mis suunab ressursse kuni seitsmes väljuvas suunas võrdselt.
bundle_et.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Eriline jaotur, mis väljastab vasakule ja paremale ainult siis, kui selle ees olev rada on blokeeritud.
bundle_et.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_et.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ülim ressursside transportimise vahend. Tulistab ressursse pika vahemaa taga asuva vastuvõtva katapuldini. Vajab töötamiseks energiat.
bundle_et.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Odav ja aeglane pump, mis ei vaja töötamiseks energiat.
bundle_et.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Täiustatud pump, mis pumpab paremini kui harilik pump, kuid vajab töötamiseks energiat.
bundle_et.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: Ülim pump, mis vajab töötamiseks palju energiat.
bundle_et.properties.block.conduit.description: Vedelike transportimise vahend, mis liigutab vedelikke edasi. Kasutatakse koos pumpade ja teiste torudega.
bundle_et.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Täiustatud toru, mis transpordib ja hoiustab vedelikke kiiremini kui algeline toru.
bundle_et.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Jaotab vedelikke kuni kolmes väljuvas suunas võrdselt. Selle jaoturiga on võimalik teatud koguses ka vedelikku hoiustada. Kasulik olukordades, kus vedelikke on vaja korraga saata mitmesse kohta.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-container.description: Stores a sizeable amount of liquid. Outputs to all sides, similarly to a liquid router.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Hoiustab suures koguses vedelikke. Kasuta puhvrite loomiseks juhul, kui ressursside nõudlus pole püsiv, või ettevaatusabinõuna tähtsate konstruktsioonide jahutussüsteemides.
bundle_et.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Toimib kui sild samal tasapinnal ristuvate torude vahel. Kasulik olukordades, kus kaks toru kannavad erinevaid vedelikke erinevatesse kohtadesse.
bundle_et.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Spetsiaalne toru, mis liigutab vedelikke üle maastiku ja ehitiste kuni 3 bloki ulatuses.
bundle_et.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Täiustatud toru, mis kasutab energiat vedelike teleportimiseks järgmise samasuguse toruni üle mitme bloki.
bundle_et.properties.block.power-node.description: Edastab energiat ühendatud sõlmpunktidesse. Sõlmed varustavad energiaga kõiki piisavalt lähedal asuvaid ja sõlmega ühenduses olevaid konstruktsioone.
bundle_et.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Täiustatud energiasõlm, mis on suurema ulatuse ja suurema võimalike ühenduste arvuga.
bundle_et.properties.block.surge-tower.description: Kaugeleulatuv energiasõlm, mis on väiksema võimalike ühenduste arvuga.
bundle_et.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_et.properties.block.battery.description: Salvestab energiat puhvrina positiivse energiabilansi ehk ülejäägi korral. Negatiivse energiabilansi ehk defitsiidi korral laetakse salvestatud energiat maha.
bundle_et.properties.block.battery-large.description: Salvestab rohkem energiat kui tavaline aku.
bundle_et.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Toodab energiat süttivate materjalide, näiteks söe, põletamisel.
bundle_et.properties.block.steam-generator.description: Täiustatud põlemisgeneraator. Tõhusam kui põlemisgeneraator, kuid vajab auru tootmiseks lisanduvat vett.
bundle_et.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Tekitab suurel hulgal energiat. Kasutab ära krüovedeliku ja põleva püratiidi temperatuuride erinevust.
bundle_et.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Töökindel generaator, mis kasutab radioaktiivsete ühendite lagunemisel eralduvat soojust, et toota sellest aeglasel kiirusel energiat.
bundle_et.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Toodab tooriumist märkimisväärsel hulgal elektrit. Vajab pidevat jahutamist. Plahvatab ägedalt, kui jahutusvedelikku tarnitakse liiga vähe.
bundle_et.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: Täiustatud generaator, mis on võimeline tootma tohutul hulgal energiat maksimaalse efektiivsusega. Protsessi käivitamiseks on vaja märkimisväärset energiaimpulssi.
bundle_et.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Odav puur, mis kaevab ressursse aeglasel kiirusel kuitahes kaua. Ainult põhiressursside kaevandamiseks.
bundle_et.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Täiustatud puur, mis suudab kaevandada titaani. Kaevandab kiiremini kui harilik puur.
bundle_et.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Lasertehnoloogia võimaldab puurida veelgi kiiremini kui pneumaatiline puur. Puur vajab energiat. Võimaldab kaevandada tooriumi.
bundle_et.properties.block.blast-drill.description: Ülim puur, mis vajab töötamiseks suurel hulgal energiat.
bundle_et.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Puurib sügavale ja pumpab põhjavett. Kasutatakse kohtades, kus pinnavett ei leidu.
bundle_et.properties.block.cultivator.description: Kultiveerib atmosfääris madalas kontsentratsioonis leiduvaid spoore tööstuses kasutatavateks spoorikobarateks.
bundle_et.properties.block.cultivator.details: Recovered technology. Used to produce massive amounts of biomass as efficiently as possible. Likely the initial incubator of the spores now covering Serpulo.
bundle_et.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Kasutab suures koguses energiat, liiva ja vett nafta puurimiseks.
bundle_et.properties.block.core-shard.description: Tuumiku esimene versioon. Tuumiku hävides kaob ühendus piirkonnaga.
bundle_et.properties.block.core-shard.details: The first iteration. Compact. Self-replicating. Equipped with single-use launch thrusters. Not designed for interplanetary travel.
bundle_et.properties.block.core-foundation.description: Tuumiku teine versioon. Tugevam. Hoiustab rohkem ressursse.
bundle_et.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: Tuumiku kolmas ja viimane versioon. Ülimalt tugev. Hoiustab massiivsel hulgal ressursse.
bundle_et.properties.block.vault.description: Hoiustab suurt hulka igat tüüpi ressursse. Hoidlast ressursside kättesaamiseks kasutatakse mahalaadijat.
bundle_et.properties.block.container.description: Hoiustab väikest hulka igat tüüpi ressursse. Hoidlast ressursside kättesaamiseks kasutatakse mahalaadijat.
bundle_et.properties.block.unloader.description: Transpordib ressursse tuumikust ja hoidlatest konveieritele või külgnevatesse ehitistesse. Mahalaetava ressursi tüüpi saab valida mahalaadijale vajutades.
bundle_et.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Saadab ressursse tagasi emalaeva, ilma et oleks vaja tuumikuga lendu tõusta.
bundle_et.properties.block.duo.description: Väike ja odav kahur, mis on kasulik maapealsete väeüksuste tõrjumiseks.
bundle_et.properties.block.scatter.description: Õhutõrjekahur, mis tulistab pliid või vanametalli lendavate väeüksuste pihta.
bundle_et.properties.block.scorch.description: Heidab tuld maapealsetele väeüksustele. Eriti efektiivne lähedal asuvate väeüksuste tõrjumiseks.
bundle_et.properties.block.wave.description: Keskmise suurusega kahur, mis pritsib vedelikke. Veega varustades kustutab leeke.
bundle_et.properties.block.lancer.description: Keskmise suurusega maapealsete väeüksuste vastane laserkahur, mis tulistab võimsaid energiakiiri.
bundle_et.properties.block.swarmer.description: Keskmise suurusega raketikahur, mis ründab nii lendavaid kui ka maapealseid üksuseid. Raketid on isesihtivad.
bundle_et.properties.block.salvo.description: Täiustatud versioon kaksikkahurist, mis tulistab korraga rohkem kuule.
bundle_et.properties.block.fuse.description: Suur lähedale sihtiv energiakahur, mis tulistab kolm läbilõikavat energiakiirt.
bundle_et.properties.block.ripple.description: Äärmiselt võimas kahur, mis tulistab mürske kobaratena kaugete vahemaade taha.
bundle_et.properties.block.cyclone.description: Suur lendavate ja maapealsete väeüksuste vastane kahur, mis tulistab plahvatavaid mürske.
bundle_et.properties.block.spectre.description: Massiivne kaheraudne kahur, mis tulistab soomuskatteid läbistavaid mürske nii lendavate kui ka maapealsete väeüksuste pihta.
bundle_et.properties.block.meltdown.description: Massiivne laserkahur, mis tekitab püsiva energiakiire. Vajab töötamiseks jahutusvedelikku.
bundle_et.properties.block.foreshadow.description: Fires a large single-target bolt over long distances. Prioritizes enemies with higher max health.
bundle_et.properties.block.repair-point.description: Parandab kõige lähemal asuvat liitlaste väeüksust.
bundle_et.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.
bundle_et.properties.block.parallax.description: Fires a tractor beam that pulls in air targets, damaging them in the process.
bundle_et.properties.block.tsunami.description: Fires powerful streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_et.properties.block.silicon-crucible.description: Refines silicon from sand and coal, using pyratite as an additional heat source. More efficient in hot locations.
bundle_et.properties.block.disassembler.description: Separates slag into trace amounts of exotic mineral components at low efficiency. Can produce thorium.
bundle_et.properties.block.overdrive-dome.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings. Requires phase fabric and silicon to operate.
bundle_et.properties.block.payload-conveyor.description: Moves large payloads, such as units from factories.
bundle_et.properties.block.payload-router.description: Splits input payloads into 3 output directions.
bundle_et.properties.block.command-center.description: Controls unit behavior with several different commands.
bundle_et.properties.block.ground-factory.description: Produces ground units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_et.properties.block.air-factory.description: Produces air units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_et.properties.block.naval-factory.description: Produces naval units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_et.properties.block.additive-reconstructor.description: Upgrades inputted units to the second tier.
bundle_et.properties.block.multiplicative-reconstructor.descr: Upgrades inputted units to the third tier.
bundle_et.properties.block.exponential-reconstructor.descript: Upgrades inputted units to the fourth tier.
bundle_et.properties.block.tetrative-reconstructor.descriptio: Upgrades inputted units to the fifth and final tier.
bundle_et.properties.block.switch.description: A toggleable switch. State can be read and controlled with logic processors.
bundle_et.properties.block.micro-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings.
bundle_et.properties.block.logic-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the micro processor.
bundle_et.properties.block.hyper-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the logic processor.
bundle_et.properties.block.memory-cell.description: Stores information for a logic processor.
bundle_et.properties.block.memory-bank.description: Stores information for a logic processor. High capacity.
bundle_et.properties.block.logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_et.properties.block.large-logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_et.properties.block.interplanetary-accelerator.descrip: A massive electromagnetic railgun tower. Accelerates cores to escape velocity for interplanetary deployment.
bundle_et.properties.block.repair-turret.description: Continuously repairs the closest damaged unit in its vicinity. Optionally accepts coolant.
bundle_et.properties.block.payload-propulsion-tower.descripti: Long-range payload transport structure. Shoots payloads to other linked payload propulsion towers.
bundle_et.properties.unit.dagger.description: Fires standard bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.mace.description: Fires streams of flame at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.fortress.description: Fires long-range artillery at ground targets.
bundle_et.properties.unit.scepter.description: Fires a barrage of charged bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.reign.description: Fires a barrage of massive piercing bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.nova.description: Fires laser bolts that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_et.properties.unit.pulsar.description: Fires arcs of electricity that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_et.properties.unit.quasar.description: Fires piercing laser beams that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight. Shielded.
bundle_et.properties.unit.vela.description: Fires a massive continuous laser beam that damages enemies, causes fires and repairs allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_et.properties.unit.corvus.description: Fires a massive laser blast that damages enemies and repairs allied structures. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_et.properties.unit.crawler.description: Runs toward enemies and self-destructs, causing a large explosion.
bundle_et.properties.unit.atrax.description: Fires debilitating orbs of slag at ground targets. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_et.properties.unit.spiroct.description: Fires sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_et.properties.unit.arkyid.description: Fires large sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_et.properties.unit.toxopid.description: Fires large electric cluster-shells and piercing lasers at enemies. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_et.properties.unit.flare.description: Fires standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_et.properties.unit.horizon.description: Drops clusters of bombs on ground targets.
bundle_et.properties.unit.zenith.description: Fires salvos of missiles at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.antumbra.description: Fires a barrage of bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.eclipse.description: Fires two piercing lasers and a barrage of flak at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.mono.description: Automatically mines copper and lead, depositing it into the core.
bundle_et.properties.unit.poly.description: Automatically rebuilds destroyed structures and assists other units in construction.
bundle_et.properties.unit.mega.description: Automatically repairs damaged structures. Capable of carrying blocks and small ground units.
bundle_et.properties.unit.quad.description: Drops large bombs on ground targets, repairing allied structures and damaging enemies. Capable of carrying medium-sized ground units.
bundle_et.properties.unit.oct.description: Protects nearby allies with its regenerating shield. Capable of carrying most ground units.
bundle_et.properties.unit.risso.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.minke.description: Fires shells and standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_et.properties.unit.bryde.description: Fires long-range artillery shells and missiles at enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.sei.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and armor-piercing bullets at enemies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.omura.description: Fires a long-range piercing railgun bolt at enemies. Constructs flare units.
bundle_et.properties.unit.alpha.description: Defends the Shard core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_et.properties.unit.beta.description: Defends the Foundation core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_et.properties.unit.gamma.description: Defends the Nucleus core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_et.properties.unit.retusa.description: Fires homing torpedoes at nearby enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_et.properties.unit.oxynoe.description: Fires structure-repairing streams of flame at nearby enemies. Targets nearby enemy projectiles with a point defense turret.
bundle_et.properties.unit.cyerce.description: Fires seeking cluster-missiles at enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_et.properties.unit.aegires.description: Shocks all enemy units and structures that enter its energy field. Repairs all allies.
bundle_et.properties.unit.navanax.description: Fires explosive EMP projectiles, dealing significant damage to enemy power networks and repairing allied structures. Melts nearby enemies with 4 autonomous laser turrets.
bundle_et.properties.lst.read: Read a number from a linked memory cell.
bundle_et.properties.lst.write: Write a number to a linked memory cell.
bundle_et.properties.lst.print: Add text to the print buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Print Flush[] is used.
bundle_et.properties.lst.draw: Add an operation to the drawing buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Draw Flush[] is used.
bundle_et.properties.lst.drawflush: Flush queued [accent]Draw[] operations to a display.
bundle_et.properties.lst.printflush: Flush queued [accent]Print[] operations to a message block.
bundle_et.properties.lst.getlink: Get a processor link by index. Starts at 0.
bundle_et.properties.lst.radar: Locate units around a building with range.
bundle_et.properties.lst.sensor: Get data from a building or unit.
bundle_et.properties.lst.end: Jump to the top of the instruction stack.
bundle_et.properties.lst.wait: Wait a certain number of seconds.
bundle_et.properties.lst.lookup: Look up an item/liquid/unit/block type by ID.\nTotal counts of each type can be accessed with:\n[accent]@unitCount[] / [accent]@itemCount[] / [accent]@liquidCount[] / [accent]@blockCount[]
bundle_et.properties.lst.unitbind: Bind to the next unit of a type, and store it in [accent]@unit[].
bundle_et.properties.lst.unitradar: Locate units around the currently bound unit.
bundle_et.properties.lst.unitlocate: Locate a specific type of position/building anywhere on the map.\nRequires a bound unit.
bundle_et.properties.logic.nounitbuild: [red]Unit building logic is not allowed here.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.type: Type of building/unit.\ne.g. for any router, this will return [accent]@router[].\nNot a string.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.shootp: Shoot at a unit/building with velocity prediction.
bundle_et.properties.laccess.controller: Unit controller. If processor controlled, returns processor.\nIf in a formation, returns leader.\nOtherwise, returns the unit itself.
bundle_et.properties.laccess.dead: Whether a unit/building is dead or no longer valid.
bundle_et.properties.laccess.controlled:
Returns:
[accent]@ctrlProcessor[] if unit controller is processor
[accent]@ctrlPlayer[] if unit/building controller is player
[accent]@ctrlFormation[] if unit is in formation
Otherwise, 0.
bundle_et.properties.laccess.progress: Action progress, 0 to 1.\nReturns production, turret reload or construction progress.
bundle_et.properties.graphicstype.clear: Fill the display with a color.
bundle_et.properties.graphicstype.color: Set color for next drawing operations.
bundle_et.properties.graphicstype.image: Draw an image of some content.\nex: [accent]@router[] or [accent]@dagger[].
bundle_et.properties.lenum.equal: Equal. Coerces types.\nNon-null objects compared with numbers become 1, otherwise 0.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.strictequal: Strict equality. Does not coerce types.\nCan be used to check for [accent]null[].
bundle_et.properties.lenum.spawn: Enemy spawn point.\nMay be a core or a position.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.resupply: Resupply points.\nOnly relevant when [accent]"Unit Ammo"[] is enabled.
bundle_et.properties.radar.from: Building to sense from.\nSensor range is limited by building range.
bundle_et.properties.radar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_et.properties.unitradar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.idle: Don't move, but keep building/mining.\nThe default state.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.approach: Approach a position with a radius.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.targetp: Shoot a target with velocity prediction.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.itemtake: Take an item from a building.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.paytake: Pick up payload at current location.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.payenter: Enter/land on the payload block the unit is on.
bundle_et.properties.lenum.getblock: Fetch a building and type at coordinates.\nUnit must be in range of position.\nSolid non-buildings will have the type [accent]@solid[].
bundle_et.properties.lenum.within: Check if unit is near a position.

bundle_eu.properties.linkfail: Huts egin du esteka irekitzean!\nURL-a zure arbelera kopiatu da.
bundle_eu.properties.screenshot.invalid: Mapa handiegia, baliteke pantaila-argazkirako memoria nahiko ez egotea.
bundle_eu.properties.indev.notready: This part of the game isn't ready yet
bundle_eu.properties.indev.campaign: [accent]Congratulations! You've reached the end of the campaign![]\n\nThis is as far as the content goes right now. Interplanetary travel will be added in future updates.
bundle_eu.properties.be.update: A new Bleeding Edge build is available:
bundle_eu.properties.schematic.replace: Badago izen bereko eskema bat. Ordeztu nahi duzu?
bundle_eu.properties.schematic.exists: A schematic by that name already exists.
bundle_eu.properties.schematic.delete.confirm: Eskema hau behin betiko suntsituko da.
bundle_eu.properties.schematic.disabled: [scarlet]Schematics disabled[]\nYou are not allowed to use schematics on this [accent]map[] or [accent]server.
bundle_eu.properties.map.delete: Ziur al zaude "[accent]{0}[]" mapa ezabatu nahi duzula?
bundle_eu.properties.feature.unsupported: Zure gailuak ez du ezaugarri hau onartzen.
bundle_eu.properties.mods.initfailed: [red]⚠[] The previous Mindustry instance failed to initialize. This was likely caused by misbehaving mods.\n\nTo prevent a crash loop, [red]all mods have been disabled.[]
bundle_eu.properties.mods.reloadexit: The game will now exit, to reload mods.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.delete.error: Ezin izan da mod-a ezabatu. Agian fitxategia erabilia izaten ari da.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.noerrorplay: [scarlet]You have mods with errors.[] Either disable the affected mods or fix the errors before playing.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.nowdisabled: [scarlet]'{0}' mod-ak menpekotasunak ditu faltan:[accent] {1}\n[lightgray]Aurretik beste mod hauek deskargatu behar dira.\nMod hau automatikoki desgaituko da.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.requiresrestart: Jolasa itxi egingo da mod-aren aldaketak aplikatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.jarwarn: [scarlet]JAR mods are inherently unsafe.[]\nMake sure you're importing this mod from a trustworthy source!
bundle_eu.properties.mod.item.remove: This item is part of the[accent] '{0}'[] mod. To remove it, uninstall that mod.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.author: [lightgray]Egilea:[] {0}
bundle_eu.properties.mod.missing: Gordetako partida honek eguneratu dituzun edo jada instalatuta ez dituzun mod-ak ditu. Gordetako partida izorratu daiteke. Ziur kargatu nahi duzula?\n[lightgray]Mod-ak:\n{0}
bundle_eu.properties.mod.preview.missing: Mod hau tailerrean argitaratu aurretik, aurrebista bat gehitu behar diozu.\nKokatu[accent] preview.png[] izeneko irudi bat mod-aren karpetan eta saiatu berriro.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.folder.missing: Karpeta formatuko mod-ak besterik ezin dira argitaratu tailerrean.\nEdozein mod karpetara bihurtzeko, deskopnrimitu fitxategia eta ezabatu zip zaharra, gero berrabiarazi jolasa edo birkargatu zure mod-ak.
bundle_eu.properties.mod.scripts.disable: Your device does not support mods with scripts. You must disable these mods to play the game.
bundle_eu.properties.name: Izena:
bundle_eu.properties.research.legacy: [accent]5.0[] research data found.\nDo you want to [accent]load this data[], or [accent]discard it[] and restart research in the new campaign (recommended)?
bundle_eu.properties.server.kicked.typeMismatch: Zerbitzari hau ez da zure konpilazio motarekin bateragarria.
bundle_eu.properties.server.kicked.playerLimit: Zerbitzari hau beteta dago. Itxaron zirrikitu bat libratu arte.
bundle_eu.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: Duela gutxi kanporatu zaituzte.\nItxaron berriro konektatzeko.
bundle_eu.properties.server.kicked.nameInUse: Badago izen bereko beste norbait\nzerbitzari honetan jada.
bundle_eu.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: Bazaude zerbitzari honetan! Ezin zara bi kontu desberdinekin konektatu.
bundle_eu.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Zerbitzari honek ez ditu konpilazio pertsonalizatuak onartzen. Deskargatu bertsio ofizial bat.
bundle_eu.properties.host.info:
[accent]Ostalaria[] botoiak zerbitzari bat abiatzen du [scarlet]6567[] atakan.
[lightgray]wifi edo sare lokal[] berean dagoen edonor zure zerbitzaria ikusi ahal beharko luke.

Jendea edonondik IP-a erabilita konektatu ahal izatea nahi baduzu, [accent]ataka birbidaltzea[] ezinbestekoa da.

[lightgray]Oharra: Inork zure sare lokalean partidara elkartzeko arazoak baditu, egiaztatu Mindustry-k baimena duela sare lokalera elkartzeko suebakiaren ezarpenetan. Kontuan izan sare publiko batzuk ez dutela zerbitzarien bilaketa baimentzen.
bundle_eu.properties.join.info:
Hemen, konektatzeko [accent]zerbitzari baten IP-a[] sartu dezakezu konektatzeko, edo [accent]sare lokaleko[] zerbitzariak bilatu.
LAN zein WAN sareetan onartzen dira hainbat jokalarien partidak .

[lightgray]Oharra: Ez dago zerbitzarien zerrenda global automatikorik, beste inorekin IP bidez konektatu nahi baduzu, ostalariari bere IP helbidea eskatu beharko diozu.
bundle_eu.properties.servers.disclaimer: Community servers are [accent]not[] owned or controlled by the developer.\n\nServers may contain user-generated content that is not appropriate for all ages.
bundle_eu.properties.invalidid: Bezero ID baliogabea! Ireki arazte txosten bat.
bundle_eu.properties.server.delete: Ziur al zaude zerbitzari hau ezabatu nahi duzula?
bundle_eu.properties.confirmban: Ziur jokalari hau debekatu nahi duzula?
bundle_eu.properties.confirmkick: Ziur jokalari hau kanporatu nahi duzula?
bundle_eu.properties.confirmvotekick: Ziur hokalari hau botatzearen alde bozkaytu nahi duzula?
bundle_eu.properties.confirmunban: Ziur jokalari hau debekatzeari utzi nahi nahi diozula?
bundle_eu.properties.confirmadmin: Ziur jokalari hau admin bihurtu nahi duzula?
bundle_eu.properties.confirmunadmin: Ziur jokalari honi admin eskubidea kendu nahi diozula?
bundle_eu.properties.joingame.title: Batu partidara
bundle_eu.properties.disconnect.data: Huts egin du munduaren datuak eskuratzean!

bundle_eu.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
The origin of spores. This is the facility in which they were researched and initially produced.
Research the technology contained within. Cultivate spores for the production of fuel and plastics.

[lightgray]Upon this facility's demise, the spores were released. Nothing in the local ecosystem could compete with such an invasive organism.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Further past the shoreline is this remote chain of islands. Records show they once had [accent]Plastanium[]-producing structures.\n\nFend off the enemy's naval units. Establish a base on the islands. Research these factories.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: A remote outpost, constructed by the enemy for the purpose of launching resources to other sectors.\n\nCross-sector transport technology is essential for further conquest. Destroy the base. Research their Launch Pads.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.impact0078.description: Here lie remnants of the interstellar transport vessel that first entered this system.\n\nSalvage as much as possible from the wreckage. Research any intact technology.
bundle_eu.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
The final target.

This coastal base contains a structure capable of launching Cores to local planets. It is extremely well guarded.

Produce naval units. Eliminate the enemy as quickly as possible. Research the launch structure.
