bundle_fi.properties.hint.respawn: To respawn as a ship, press [accent][[V][].
bundle_fi.properties.hint.respawn.mobile: You have switched control to a unit/structure. To respawn as a ship, [accent]tap the avatar in the top left.[]
bundle_fi.properties.hint.desktopPause: Press [accent][[Space][] to pause and unpause the game.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.placeDrill: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and click on a copper patch to place it.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.placeDrill.mobile: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and tap on a copper patch to place it.\n\nPress the \ue800 [accent]checkmark[] at the bottom right to confirm.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.placeConveyor:
Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a  [accent]Conveyor[] from the  [accent]Distribution[] tab.

Click and drag to place multiple conveyors.
[accent]Scroll[] to rotate.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.placeConveyor.mobile: Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a \uf896 [accent]Conveyor[] from the \ue814 [accent]Distribution[] tab.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to place multiple conveyors.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.placeTurret:
Place  [accent]Turrets[] to defend your base from enemies.

Turrets require ammo - in this case, copper.
Use conveyors and drills to supply them.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.breaking.mobile: Activate the \ue817 [accent]hammer[] in the bottom right and tap to break blocks.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to break in a selection.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.blockInfo: View information of a block by selecting it in the [accent]build menu[], then selecting the [accent][[?][] button at the right.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.derelict: [accent]Derelict[] structures are broken remnants of old bases that no longer function.\n\nThese structures can be [accent]deconstructed[] for resources.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.research: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button to research new technology.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.research.mobile: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[] to research new technology.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.unitControl: Hold [accent][[L-ctrl][] and [accent]click[] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.unitControl.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.launch: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the bottom right.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.launch.mobile: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[].
bundle_fi.properties.hint.schematicSelect: Hold [accent][[F][] and drag to select blocks to copy and paste.\n\n[accent][[Middle Click][] to copy a single block type.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind: Hold [accent][[L-Ctrl][] while dragging conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind.mobile: Enable \ue844 [accent]diagonal mode[] and drag conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.boost: Hold [accent][[L-Shift][] to fly over obstacles with your current unit.\n\nOnly a few ground units have boosters.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.command: Press [accent][[G][] to command nearby units of [accent]similar type[] into formation.\n\nTo command ground units, you must first control another ground unit.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.command.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] your unit to command nearby units into formation.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.payloadPickup: Press [accent][[[] to pick up small blocks or units.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.payloadPickup.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] a small block or unit to pick it up.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.payloadDrop.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] an empty location to drop a payload there.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.waveFire: [accent]Wave[] turrets with water as ammunition will automatically put out nearby fires.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.generator: \uf879 [accent]Combustion Generators[] burn coal and transmit power to adjacent blocks.\n\nPower transmission range can be extended with \uf87f [accent]Power Nodes[].
bundle_fi.properties.hint.guardian: [accent]Guardian[] units are armored. Weak ammo such as [accent]Copper[] and [accent]Lead[] is [scarlet]not effective[].\n\nUse higher tier turrets or \uf835 [accent]Graphite[] \uf861Duo/\uf859Salvo ammunition to take Guardians down.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.coreUpgrade: Cores can be upgraded by [accent]placing higher-tier cores over them[].\n\nPlace a \uf868 [accent]Foundation[] core over the \uf869 [accent]Shard[] core. Make sure it is free from nearby obstructions.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.presetLaunch: Gray [accent]landing zone sectors[], such as [accent]Frozen Forest[], can be launched to from anywhere. They do not require capture of nearby territory.\n\n[accent]Numbered sectors[], such as this one, are [accent]optional[].
bundle_fi.properties.hint.presetDifficulty: This sector has a [scarlet]high enemy threat level[].\nLaunching to such sectors is [accent]not recommended[] without proper technology and preparation.
bundle_fi.properties.hint.coreIncinerate: After the core is filled to capacity with an item, any extra items of that type it receives will be [accent]incinerated[].
bundle_fi.properties.hint.coopCampaign: When playing the [accent]co-op campaign[], items that are produced in the current map will also be sent [accent]to your local sectors[].\n\nAny new research done by the host also carries over.
bundle_fi.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.item.copper.details: Copper. Abnormally abundant metal on Serpulo. Structurally weak unless reinforced.
bundle_fi.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.item.lead.details: Dense. Inert. Extensively used in batteries.\nNote: Likely toxic to biological life forms. Not that there are many left here.
bundle_fi.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_fi.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_fi.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_fi.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle_fi.properties.item.coal.details: Appears to be fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event.
bundle_fi.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_fi.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_fi.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_fi.properties.item.scrap.details: Leftover remnants of old structures and units.
bundle_fi.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle_fi.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_fi.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_fi.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_fi.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_fi.properties.item.spore-pod.details: Spores. Likely a synthetic life form. Emit gases toxic to other biological life. Extremely invasive. Highly flammable in certain conditions.
bundle_fi.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle_fi.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle_fi.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle_fi.properties.block.armored-conveyor.description: Moves items at the same speed as titanium conveyors, but possesses more armor. Does not accept inputs from the sides from anything but other conveyor belts.
bundle_fi.properties.block.illuminator.description: A small, compact, configurable light source. Requires power to function.
bundle_fi.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_fi.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_fi.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle_fi.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle_fi.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle_fi.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle_fi.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_fi.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle_fi.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle_fi.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle_fi.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_fi.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle_fi.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_fi.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_fi.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle_fi.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle_fi.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fi.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_fi.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle_fi.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle_fi.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_fi.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_fi.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_fi.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_fi.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle_fi.properties.block.router.details: A necessary evil. Using next to production inputs is not advised, as they will get clogged by output.
bundle_fi.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_fi.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router. Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_fi.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_fi.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle_fi.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_fi.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_fi.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_fi.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_fi.properties.block.liquid-container.description: Stores a sizeable amount of liquid. Outputs to all sides, similarly to a liquid router.
bundle_fi.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_fi.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_fi.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_fi.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range and more connections.
bundle_fi.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_fi.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_fi.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_fi.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_fi.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_fi.properties.block.steam-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_fi.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_fi.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_fi.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_fi.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_fi.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_fi.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_fi.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_fi.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_fi.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_fi.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_fi.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_fi.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_fi.properties.block.cultivator.details: Recovered technology. Used to produce massive amounts of biomass as efficiently as possible. Likely the initial incubator of the spores now covering Serpulo.
bundle_fi.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_fi.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_fi.properties.block.core-shard.details: The first iteration. Compact. Self-replicating. Equipped with single-use launch thrusters. Not designed for interplanetary travel.
bundle_fi.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_fi.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_fi.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_fi.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_fi.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_fi.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_fi.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_fi.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_fi.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_fi.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_fi.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_fi.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_fi.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range energy turret. Fires three piercing beams at nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely powerful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_fi.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_fi.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle_fi.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle_fi.properties.block.foreshadow.description: Fires a large single-target bolt over long distances. Prioritizes enemies with higher max health.
bundle_fi.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_fi.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.
bundle_fi.properties.block.parallax.description: Fires a tractor beam that pulls in air targets, damaging them in the process.
bundle_fi.properties.block.tsunami.description: Fires powerful streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_fi.properties.block.silicon-crucible.description: Refines silicon from sand and coal, using pyratite as an additional heat source. More efficient in hot locations.
bundle_fi.properties.block.disassembler.description: Separates slag into trace amounts of exotic mineral components at low efficiency. Can produce thorium.
bundle_fi.properties.block.overdrive-dome.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings. Requires phase fabric and silicon to operate.
bundle_fi.properties.block.payload-conveyor.description: Moves large payloads, such as units from factories.
bundle_fi.properties.block.payload-router.description: Splits input payloads into 3 output directions.
bundle_fi.properties.block.command-center.description: Controls unit behavior with several different commands.
bundle_fi.properties.block.ground-factory.description: Produces ground units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_fi.properties.block.air-factory.description: Produces air units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_fi.properties.block.naval-factory.description: Produces naval units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_fi.properties.block.additive-reconstructor.description: Upgrades inputted units to the second tier.
bundle_fi.properties.block.multiplicative-reconstructor.descr: Upgrades inputted units to the third tier.
bundle_fi.properties.block.exponential-reconstructor.descript: Upgrades inputted units to the fourth tier.
bundle_fi.properties.block.tetrative-reconstructor.descriptio: Upgrades inputted units to the fifth and final tier.
bundle_fi.properties.block.switch.description: A toggleable switch. State can be read and controlled with logic processors.
bundle_fi.properties.block.micro-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings.
bundle_fi.properties.block.logic-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the micro processor.
bundle_fi.properties.block.hyper-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the logic processor.
bundle_fi.properties.block.memory-cell.description: Stores information for a logic processor.
bundle_fi.properties.block.memory-bank.description: Stores information for a logic processor. High capacity.
bundle_fi.properties.block.logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_fi.properties.block.large-logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_fi.properties.block.interplanetary-accelerator.descrip: A massive electromagnetic railgun tower. Accelerates cores to escape velocity for interplanetary deployment.
bundle_fi.properties.block.repair-turret.description: Continuously repairs the closest damaged unit in its vicinity. Optionally accepts coolant.
bundle_fi.properties.block.payload-propulsion-tower.descripti: Long-range payload transport structure. Shoots payloads to other linked payload propulsion towers.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.dagger.description: Fires standard bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.mace.description: Fires streams of flame at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.fortress.description: Fires long-range artillery at ground targets.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.scepter.description: Fires a barrage of charged bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.reign.description: Fires a barrage of massive piercing bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.nova.description: Fires laser bolts that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.pulsar.description: Fires arcs of electricity that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.quasar.description: Fires piercing laser beams that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight. Shielded.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.vela.description: Fires a massive continuous laser beam that damages enemies, causes fires and repairs allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.corvus.description: Fires a massive laser blast that damages enemies and repairs allied structures. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.crawler.description: Runs toward enemies and self-destructs, causing a large explosion.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.atrax.description: Fires debilitating orbs of slag at ground targets. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.spiroct.description: Fires sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.arkyid.description: Fires large sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.toxopid.description: Fires large electric cluster-shells and piercing lasers at enemies. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.flare.description: Fires standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.horizon.description: Drops clusters of bombs on ground targets.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.zenith.description: Fires salvos of missiles at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.antumbra.description: Fires a barrage of bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.eclipse.description: Fires two piercing lasers and a barrage of flak at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.mono.description: Automatically mines copper and lead, depositing it into the core.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.poly.description: Automatically rebuilds destroyed structures and assists other units in construction.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.mega.description: Automatically repairs damaged structures. Capable of carrying blocks and small ground units.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.quad.description: Drops large bombs on ground targets, repairing allied structures and damaging enemies. Capable of carrying medium-sized ground units.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.oct.description: Protects nearby allies with its regenerating shield. Capable of carrying most ground units.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.risso.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.minke.description: Fires shells and standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.bryde.description: Fires long-range artillery shells and missiles at enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.sei.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and armor-piercing bullets at enemies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.omura.description: Fires a long-range piercing railgun bolt at enemies. Constructs flare units.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.alpha.description: Defends the Shard core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.beta.description: Defends the Foundation core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.gamma.description: Defends the Nucleus core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.retusa.description: Fires homing torpedoes at nearby enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.oxynoe.description: Fires structure-repairing streams of flame at nearby enemies. Targets nearby enemy projectiles with a point defense turret.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.cyerce.description: Fires seeking cluster-missiles at enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.aegires.description: Shocks all enemy units and structures that enter its energy field. Repairs all allies.
bundle_fi.properties.unit.navanax.description: Fires explosive EMP projectiles, dealing significant damage to enemy power networks and repairing allied structures. Melts nearby enemies with 4 autonomous laser turrets.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.read: Read a number from a linked memory cell.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.write: Write a number to a linked memory cell.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.print: Add text to the print buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Print Flush[] is used.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.draw: Add an operation to the drawing buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Draw Flush[] is used.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.drawflush: Flush queued [accent]Draw[] operations to a display.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.printflush: Flush queued [accent]Print[] operations to a message block.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.getlink: Get a processor link by index. Starts at 0.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.radar: Locate units around a building with range.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.sensor: Get data from a building or unit.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.end: Jump to the top of the instruction stack.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.wait: Wait a certain number of seconds.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.lookup: Look up an item/liquid/unit/block type by ID.\nTotal counts of each type can be accessed with:\n[accent]@unitCount[] / [accent]@itemCount[] / [accent]@liquidCount[] / [accent]@blockCount[]
bundle_fi.properties.lst.unitbind: Bind to the next unit of a type, and store it in [accent]@unit[].
bundle_fi.properties.lst.unitradar: Locate units around the currently bound unit.
bundle_fi.properties.lst.unitlocate: Locate a specific type of position/building anywhere on the map.\nRequires a bound unit.
bundle_fi.properties.logic.nounitbuild: [red]Unit building logic is not allowed here.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.type: Type of building/unit.\ne.g. for any router, this will return [accent]@router[].\nNot a string.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.shootp: Shoot at a unit/building with velocity prediction.
bundle_fi.properties.laccess.controller: Unit controller. If processor controlled, returns processor.\nIf in a formation, returns leader.\nOtherwise, returns the unit itself.
bundle_fi.properties.laccess.dead: Whether a unit/building is dead or no longer valid.
bundle_fi.properties.laccess.controlled:
Returns:
[accent]@ctrlProcessor[] if unit controller is processor
[accent]@ctrlPlayer[] if unit/building controller is player
[accent]@ctrlFormation[] if unit is in formation
Otherwise, 0.
bundle_fi.properties.laccess.progress: Action progress, 0 to 1.\nReturns production, turret reload or construction progress.
bundle_fi.properties.graphicstype.clear: Fill the display with a color.
bundle_fi.properties.graphicstype.color: Set color for next drawing operations.
bundle_fi.properties.graphicstype.image: Draw an image of some content.\nex: [accent]@router[] or [accent]@dagger[].
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.equal: Equal. Coerces types.\nNon-null objects compared with numbers become 1, otherwise 0.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.strictequal: Strict equality. Does not coerce types.\nCan be used to check for [accent]null[].
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.spawn: Enemy spawn point.\nMay be a core or a position.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.resupply: Resupply points.\nOnly relevant when [accent]"Unit Ammo"[] is enabled.
bundle_fi.properties.radar.from: Building to sense from.\nSensor range is limited by building range.
bundle_fi.properties.radar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_fi.properties.unitradar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.idle: Don't move, but keep building/mining.\nThe default state.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.approach: Approach a position with a radius.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.targetp: Shoot a target with velocity prediction.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.itemtake: Take an item from a building.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.paytake: Pick up payload at current location.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.payenter: Enter/land on the payload block the unit is on.
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.getblock: Fetch a building and type at coordinates.\nUnit must be in range of position.\nSolid non-buildings will have the type [accent]@solid[].
bundle_fi.properties.lenum.within: Check if unit is near a position.

bundle_fil.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle_fil.properties.join.info:
Dito, maaari mong ipasok ang isang [accent]server IP[] para ikonekta, o pag diskubre ng [accent]local network[] or [accent]global[] servers pwedeng konektahin.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]If you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP, which can be found by googling "my ip" from their device.

bundle_fil.properties.sector.groundZero.description: Ang pinakamainam na lokasyon upang magsimulang muli. Mababang banta ng kaaway. Kaunting mapagkukunan.\nMagtipon ng mas maraming tingga at tanso hangga't maaari.\nItuloy.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Kahit dito, mas malapit sa mga bundok, ang mga spore ay kumalat. Ang napakalamig na temperatura ay hindi maaaring maglaman ng mga ito magpakailanman.\n\nSimulan ang pakikipagsapalaran sa kapangyarihan. Bumuo ng mga generator ng pagkasunog. Matutong gumamit ng mga mender.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: Sa labas ng disyerto ay matatagpuan ang Salt Flats. Ilang resource ang makikita sa lokasyong ito.\n\nNagtayo ang kaaway ng resource storage complex dito. Tanggalin ang kanilang core. Walang iwanan na nakatayo.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.craters.description: Ang tubig ay naipon sa bunganga na ito, relic ng mga lumang digmaan. Bawiin ang lugar. Mangolekta ng buhangin. Gumawa ng metaglass. Magbomba ng tubig upang palamig ang mga turret at drill.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Nakalipas ang mga basura, ay ang baybayin. Minsan, ang lokasyong ito ay mayroong hanay ng pagtatanggol sa baybayin. Hindi gaanong natitira. Tanging ang pinakapangunahing mga istruktura ng depensa ang nananatiling hindi nasaktan, lahat ng iba pa ay nabawasan sa scrap.\nIpagpatuloy ang pagpapalawak. Tuklasin muli ang teknolohiya.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Sa kabilang bahagi ng lupain ay matatagpuan ang mga bundok, ngunit hindi nababahiran ng mga spores.
I-extract ang masaganang titanium sa lugar na ito. Alamin kung paano ito gamitin.

Mas malaki ang presensya ng kaaway dito. Huwag silang bigyan ng oras na ipadala ang kanilang pinakamalakas na unit.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: Ang lugar na ito ay tinutubuan, mas malapit sa pinagmumulan ng mga spores.\nNagtatag ang kalaban ng isang outpost dito. Bumuo ng mga yunit ng Titan. Sirain mo. Bawiin ang nawala.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
Ang labas ng isang oil production zone, sa pagitan ng mga bundok at disyerto. Isa sa ilang lugar na may magagamit na reserbang tar.
Bagaman inabandona, ang lugar na ito ay may ilang mapanganib na pwersa ng kaaway sa malapit. Huwag maliitin ang mga ito.

[lightgray]Magsaliksik ng teknolohiya sa pagproseso ng langis kung maaari.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: Isang mapanganib na sona. Maraming mapagkukunan, ngunit maliit na espasyo. Mataas na panganib ng pagkasira. Umalis sa lalong madaling panahon. Huwag magpalinlang sa mahabang espasyo sa pagitan ng mga pag-atake ng kaaway.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
Isang dating pasilidad para sa paggawa at pagpoproseso ng thorium, naging mga guho.
[lightgray]Saliksikin ang thorium at ang maraming gamit nito.

Ang kaaway ay naroroon sa napakaraming bilang, patuloy na naghahanap ng mga umaatake.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: Isang transition area sa pagitan ng matataas na bundok at mas mababang, spore-ridden na lupain. Matatagpuan dito ang isang maliit na base ng reconnaissance ng kaaway.\nSirain ito.\nGumamit ng mga unit ng Dagger at Crawler. Ilabas ang dalawang core.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
Ang pinagmulan ng mga spores. Ito ang pasilidad kung saan sila sinaliksik at unang ginawa.
Saliksikin ang teknolohiyang nakapaloob sa loob. Linangin ang mga spores para sa paggawa ng gasolina at mga plastik.

[lightgray]Sa pagkamatay ng pasilidad na ito, inilabas ang mga spores. Wala sa lokal na ecosystem ang maaaring makipagkumpitensya sa gayong invasive na organismo.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Sa kabila ng baybayin ay ang malayong hanay ng mga isla. Ipinapakita ng mga rekord na minsan silang nagkaroon ng [accent]Plastanium[]-producing structures.\n\nTakasan ang mga yunit ng hukbong-dagat ng kalaban. Magtatag ng isang base sa mga isla. Magsaliksik sa mga pabrika na ito.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: Isang malayong outpost, na itinayo ng kaaway para sa layunin ng paglulunsad ng mga mapagkukunan sa iba pang mga sektor.\n\nAng cross-sector transport technology ay mahalaga para sa karagdagang pananakop. Wasakin ang base. Magsaliksik sa kanilang mga Launch Pad.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.impact0078.description: Dito nakalatag ang mga labi ng interstellar transport vessel na unang pumasok sa sistemang ito.\n\nSalvage hangga't maaari mula sa pagkawasak. Magsaliksik ng anumang buo na teknolohiya.
bundle_fil.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
Ang huling target.

Ang coastal base na ito ay naglalaman ng isang istraktura na may kakayahang maglunsad ng mga Core sa mga lokal na planeta. Ito ay napakahusay na binabantayan.

Gumawa ng mga yunit ng hukbong-dagat. Tanggalin ang kalaban sa lalong madaling panahon. Magsaliksik sa istraktura ng paglulunsad.

bundle_fil.properties.block.constructor.description: Fabricates structures up to 2x2 tiles in size.
bundle_fil.properties.block.large-constructor.name: Malaking Constructor
bundle_fil.properties.block.large-constructor.description: Gumagawa ng mga istruktura hanggang sa 4x4 na tile ang laki.
bundle_fil.properties.block.deconstructor.name: Deconstructor
bundle_fil.properties.block.deconstructor.description: Nagde-deconstruct ng mga istruktura at yunit. Ibinabalik ang 100% ng halaga ng block.
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-loader.name: Payload Loader
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-loader.description: Mag-load ng mga likido at mga item sa mga blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-unloader.name: Payload Unloader
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-unloader.description: Naglalabas ng mga likido at mga item mula sa mga blocks.
