bundle_fil.properties.hint.mine: Lumipat malapit sa \uf8c4 copper ore at [accent]tap[] ito upang manu-manong minahan.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.depositItems: Upang maglipat ng mga item, i-drag mula sa iyong ship patungo sa core.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.respawn: To respawn as a ship, press [accent][[V][].
bundle_fil.properties.hint.respawn.mobile: You have switched control to a unit/structure. To respawn as a ship, [accent]tap the avatar in the top left.[]
bundle_fil.properties.hint.desktopPause: Press [accent][[Space][] to pause and unpause the game.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.placeDrill: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and click on a copper patch to place it.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.placeDrill.mobile: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and tap on a copper patch to place it.\n\nPress the \ue800 [accent]checkmark[] at the bottom right to confirm.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.placeConveyor:
Ang mga conveyor ay naglilipat ng mga item mula sa mga drill patungo sa iba pang mga bloke. Pumili ng  [accent]Conveyor[] mula sa tab na  [accent]Distribution[].

I-click at i-drag upang maglagay ng maraming conveyor.
[accent]Mag-scroll[] para i-rotate.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.placeConveyor.mobile: Ang mga conveyor ay naglilipat ng mga item mula sa mga drill patungo sa iba pang mga bloke. Pumili ng \uf896 [accent]Conveyor[] mula sa tab na \ue814 [accent]Distribution[].\n\nI-hold down ang iyong daliri sa isang segundo at i-drag upang maglagay ng maraming conveyor.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.placeTurret:
Ilagay ang  [accent]Turrets[] upang ipagtanggol ang iyong base mula sa mga kaaway.

Ang mga turret ay nangangailangan ng ammo - sa kasong ito, copper.
Gumamit ng mga conveyor at drills para matustusan ang mga ito.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.breaking.mobile: I-activate ang \ue817 [accent]hammer[] sa kanang bahagi sa ibaba at i-tap para masira ang mga bloke.\n\nI-hold ang iyong daliri sa isang segundo at i-drag para masira ang isang seleksyon.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.blockInfo: Tingnan ang impormasyon ng isang block sa pamamagitan ng pagpili nito sa [accent]build menu[], pagkatapos ay pagpili sa [accent][[?][] na button sa kanan.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.derelict: Ang [accent]Derelict[] na mga istraktura ay mga sirang labi ng mga lumang base na hindi na gumagana.\n\nAng mga istrukturang ito ay maaaring [accent]deconstructed[] para sa mga mapagkukunan.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.research: Gamitin ang button na \ue875 [accent]Research[] para magsaliksik ng bagong teknolohiya.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.research.mobile: Gamitin ang button na \ue875 [accent]Research[] sa \ue88c [accent]Menu[] para magsaliksik ng bagong teknolohiya.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.unitControl: Pindutin ang [accent][[L-ctrl][] at [accent]click[] upang kontrolin ang mga friendly na unit o turrets.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.unitControl.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] para kontrolin ang mga friendly na unit o turrets.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.launch: Kapag sapat na ang mga mapagkukunan, maaari mong [accent]Ilunsad[] sa pamamagitan ng pagpili sa mga kalapit na sektor mula sa \ue827 [accent]Map[] sa kanang ibaba.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.launch.mobile: Kapag sapat na ang mga mapagkukunan, maaari mong [accent]Ilunsad[] sa pamamagitan ng pagpili sa mga kalapit na sektor mula sa \ue827 [accent]Map[] sa \ue88c [accent]Menu[].
bundle_fil.properties.hint.schematicSelect: Pindutin ang [accent][[F][] at i-drag upang pumili ng mga bloke na kokopyahin at ipe-paste.\n\n[accent][[Middle Click][] upang kopyahin ang isang uri ng block.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind: Hold [accent][[L-Ctrl][] while dragging conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind.mobile: Pindutin ang [accent][[L-Ctrl][] habang dina-drag ang mga conveyor para awtomatikong bumuo ng landas.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.boost: Pindutin ang [accent][[L-Shift][] para lumipad sa mga obstacle kasama ang iyong kasalukuyang unit.\n\nIlang ground unit lang ang may mga booster
bundle_fil.properties.hint.command: Pindutin ang [accent][[G][] para mag-utos ng mga kalapit na unit ng [accent]katulad na uri[] sa pagbuo.\n\nUpang mag-utos ng mga ground unit, kailangan mo munang kontrolin ang isa pang ground unit.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.command.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] ang iyong unit para mag-utos ng mga kalapit na unit sa pagbuo.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.payloadPickup: Pindutin ang [accent][[[] para kunin ang maliliit na block o unit.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.payloadPickup.mobile: [accent]I-tap nang matagal ang[] isang maliit na block o unit para kunin ito.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.payloadDrop: Pindutin ang [accent]][] para mag-drop ng payload.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.payloadDrop.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] an empty location to drop a payload there.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.waveFire: [accent]Wave[] turrets with water as ammunition will automatically put out nearby fires.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.generator: \uf879 [accent]Combustion Generators[] burn coal and transmit power to adjacent blocks.\n\nPower transmission range can be extended with \uf87f [accent]Power Nodes[].
bundle_fil.properties.hint.guardian: [accent]Guardian[] units are armored. Weak ammo such as [accent]Copper[] and [accent]Lead[] is [scarlet]not effective[].\n\nUse higher tier turrets or \uf835 [accent]Graphite[] \uf861Duo/\uf859Salvo ammunition to take Guardians down.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.coreUpgrade: Cores can be upgraded by [accent]placing higher-tier cores over them[].\n\nPlace a \uf868 [accent]Foundation[] core over the \uf869 [accent]Shard[] core. Make sure it is free from nearby obstructions.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.presetLaunch: Gray [accent]landing zone sectors[], such as [accent]Frozen Forest[], can be launched to from anywhere. They do not require capture of nearby territory.\n\n[accent]Numbered sectors[], such as this one, are [accent]optional[].
bundle_fil.properties.hint.presetDifficulty: This sector has a [scarlet]high enemy threat level[].\nLaunching to such sectors is [accent]not recommended[] without proper technology and preparation.
bundle_fil.properties.hint.coreIncinerate: After the core is filled to capacity with an item, any extra items of that type it receives will be [accent]incinerated[].
bundle_fil.properties.hint.coopCampaign: When playing the [accent]co-op campaign[], items that are produced in the current map will also be sent [accent]to your local sectors[].\n\nAny new research done by the host also carries over.
bundle_fil.properties.item.copper.description: Ang pinaka basic na struktural materyal. Malawakang ginagamit sa lahat ng types ng blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.item.copper.details: Copper. Abnormally abundant metal on Serpulo. Structurally weak unless reinforced.
bundle_fil.properties.item.lead.description: Ang panimulang at basic na materyal. Malawakang ginagamit sa electronika at sa transportasyon ng likido gamit ng blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.item.lead.details: Dense. Inert. Extensively used in batteries.\nNote: Likely toxic to biological life forms. Not that there are many left here.
bundle_fil.properties.item.metaglass.description: Ito ay matigas na glass compound. Malawakang ginagamit sa distribution ng likido at pag imbakan.
bundle_fil.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, Malawakang ginagamit sa ammunisyon at sa mga bahagi ng electrisidad.
bundle_fil.properties.item.sand.description: Ang karaniwang  materyal na malawakang ginagamit sa smelting, pareho sa alloying at bilang flux
bundle_fil.properties.item.coal.description: Ang karaniwang  materyal na malawakang ginagamit sa smelting, pareho sa alloying at bilang flux
bundle_fil.properties.item.coal.details: Appears to be fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event.
bundle_fil.properties.item.titanium.description: Ang bihira hanapin at magaan na metal. Malawaking ginagamit sa transportasyon ng likido, mga drills at aircraft.
bundle_fil.properties.item.thorium.description: Ito ay malagong, radioactive metal ginagamit para sa supporta sa istraktura at nuklear fuel.
bundle_fil.properties.item.scrap.description: Galing sa mga matatanda at natirang struktura  at units. Naglalaman ng ibat ibang metals.
bundle_fil.properties.item.scrap.details: Leftover remnants of old structures and units.
bundle_fil.properties.item.silicon.description: Ang nakakatulong na semiconductor. Aplikasyon sa solar panels, Komplikadong electronika at homing turret ammunisyon.
bundle_fil.properties.item.plastanium.description: Ito ay magaan, malagkit na materyal ginamit sa advanced aircraft at fragmentation ammunisyon.
bundle_fil.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Ito ay malapit na mawalan ng timbang na substansya ginamit sa advanced  na electronika at self-repairing na technolohiya.
bundle_fil.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Ang advanced na pinag halung metal na may kakaibang electrical properties.
bundle_fil.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Isang pod ng mga sintetikong spore, na synthesize mula sa mga konsentrasyon sa atmospera para sa mga layuning pang-industriya. Ginagamit para sa conversion sa langis, pampasabog at gasolina.
bundle_fil.properties.item.spore-pod.details: Mga spores. Malamang na isang sintetikong anyo ng buhay. Naglalabas ng mga gas na nakakalason sa ibang biyolohikal na buhay. Lubhang invasive. Lubos na nasusunog sa ilang mga kundisyon.
bundle_fil.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Isang hindi matatag na compound na ginagamit sa mga bomba at pampasabog. Na-synthesize mula sa mga spore pod at iba pang pabagu-bagong substance. Gamitin bilang gasolina ay hindi pinapayuhan.
bundle_fil.properties.item.pyratite.description: Isang sobrang nasusunog na substance na ginagamit sa mga armas na nagniningas.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.water.description: Ang pinaka-kapaki-pakinabang na likido. Karaniwang ginagamit para sa mga cooling machine at pagpoproseso ng basura.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.slag.description: Iba't ibang uri ng tinunaw na metal na pinaghalo. Maaaring ihiwalay sa mga mineral na bumubuo nito, o i-spray sa mga yunit ng kaaway bilang sandata.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.oil.description: Isang likidong ginagamit sa advanced na produksyon ng materyal. Maaaring gawing karbon bilang panggatong, o i-spray at sunugin bilang sandata.
bundle_fil.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Isang inert, non-corrosive na likido na nilikha mula sa tubig at titanium. May napakataas na kapasidad ng init. Malawakang ginagamit bilang coolant.
bundle_fil.properties.block.armored-conveyor.description: Gumagalaw ng mga item sa parehong bilis ng mga titanium conveyor, ngunit nagtataglay ng mas maraming sandata. Hindi tumatanggap ng mga input mula sa mga gilid mula sa anumang bagay maliban sa iba pang mga conveyor belt.
bundle_fil.properties.block.illuminator.description: Isang maliit, compact, configurable light source. Nangangailangan ng kapangyarihan upang gumana.
bundle_fil.properties.block.message.description: Nag-iimbak ng mensahe. Ginagamit para sa komunikasyon sa pagitan ng mga kaalyado.
bundle_fil.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Pinipilit ang mga tipak ng karbon sa purong mga piraso ng grapayt.
bundle_fil.properties.block.multi-press.description: Isang na-upgrade na bersyon ng graphite press. Gumagamit ng tubig at kapangyarihan upang iproseso ang karbon nang mabilis at mahusay.
bundle_fil.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Binabawasan ang buhangin na may purong karbon. Gumagawa ng silikon.
bundle_fil.properties.block.kiln.description: Tinutunaw ang buhangin at humahantong sa compound na kilala bilang metaglass. Nangangailangan ng maliit na halaga ng kapangyarihan upang tumakbo.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Gumagawa ng plastanium mula sa langis at titanium.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric mula sa radioactive thorium at buhangin. Nangangailangan ng napakalaking dami ng kapangyarihan upang gumana.
bundle_fil.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Pinagsasama ang titanium, lead, silicon at tanso upang makagawa ng surge alloy.
bundle_fil.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Hinahalo ang tubig at pinong titanium powder sa cryofluid. Mahalaga para sa paggamit ng thorium reactor.
bundle_fil.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Dinudurog at hinahalo ang mga kumpol ng spores na may pyratite upang makagawa ng blast compound.
bundle_fil.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Naghahalo ng coal, lead at sand sa sobrang nasusunog na pyratite.
bundle_fil.properties.block.melter.description: Tinutunaw ang scrap sa slag para sa karagdagang pagproseso o paggamit sa mga wave turret.
bundle_fil.properties.block.separator.description: Pinaghihiwalay ang slag sa mga bahagi ng mineral nito. Inilalabas ang pinalamig na resulta.
bundle_fil.properties.block.spore-press.description: Kino-compress ang mga spore pod sa ilalim ng matinding pressure para mag-synthesize ng oil.
bundle_fil.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Dinudurog ang scrap sa pinong sand.
bundle_fil.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Pinapatigas ang oil sa mga coal.
bundle_fil.properties.block.incinerator.description: Pinapasingaw ang anumang labis na bagay o likidong natatanggap nito.
bundle_fil.properties.block.power-void.description: Walang laman ang lahat ng kuryente ipinasok dito. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.power-source.description: Walang katapusang naglalabas ng kuryente. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.item-source.description: Walang katapusan na naglalabas ng mga item. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.item-void.description: Sinisira ang anumang mga item. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Walang katapusan na naglalabas ng mga likido. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-void.description: Tinatanggal ang anumang likido. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-source.description: Walang katapusang naglalabas ng mga payload. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-void.description: Sinisira ang anumang mga payload. Sandbox lang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Isang murang defensive block.\nKapaki-pakinabang para sa pagprotekta sa core at mga turret sa unang ilang alon.
bundle_fil.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Isang murang defensive block.\nKapaki-pakinabang para sa pagprotekta sa core at mga turret sa unang ilang alon.\nKumuha ng maraming tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: Isang katamtamang malakas na defensive block.\nNagbibigay ng katamtamang proteksyon mula sa mga kaaway.
bundle_fil.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: Isang medyo malakas na defensive block.\nNagbibigay ng katamtamang proteksyon mula sa mga kaaway.\nKumuha ng maraming tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: Isang espesyal na uri ng pader na sumisipsip ng mga electric arc at hinaharangan ang mga awtomatikong koneksyon ng power node.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: Isang espesyal na uri ng pader na sumisipsip ng mga electric arc at hinaharangan ang mga awtomatikong koneksyon ng power node.\n Gumagamit ng maraming tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Isang malakas na defensive block.\nDisenteng proteksyon mula sa mga kaaway.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Isang malakas na defensive block.\nDisenteng proteksyon mula sa mga kaaway.\nGumagamit ng maraming tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Isang pader na pinahiran ng espesyal na phase-based na reflective compound. Pinapalihis ang karamihan sa mga bala sa pagtama.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Isang pader na pinahiran ng espesyal na phase-based na reflective compound. Pinapalihis ang karamihan sa mga bala kapag natamaan.\nGumagamit ng maraming tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Isang napakatibay na defensive block.\nNagpapalaki ng singil sa bullet contact, na ilalabas ito nang random.
bundle_fil.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Isang napakatibay na defensive block.\nBumubuo ng singil sa bullet contact, ilalabas ito nang random.\nGumagamit ng maraming tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.door.description: Isang maliit na pinto. Maaaring buksan o isara sa pamamagitan ng pag-tap.
bundle_fil.properties.block.door-large.description: Isang malaking pinto. Maaaring buksan at isara sa pamamagitan ng pag-tap.\nSpans maramihang mga tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mender.description: Pana-panahong nag-aayos ng mga blocks sa paligid nito. Pinapanatiling maayos ang mga depensa sa pagitan ng mga alon.\nOpsyonal na gumagamit ng silicon upang palakasin ang saklaw at kahusayan.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Isang na-upgrade na bersyon ng Mender. Nag-aayos ng mga bloke sa paligid nito.\nOpsyonal na gumagamit ng phase fabric upang palakasin ang saklaw at kahusayan.
bundle_fil.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Pinapataas ang bilis ng mga kalapit na buildings.\nOpsyonal na gumagamit ng phase fabric upang palakasin ang saklaw at kahusayan.
bundle_fil.properties.block.force-projector.description: Gumagawa ng hexagonal force field sa paligid nito, na nagpoprotekta sa mga gusali at unit sa loob mula sa pagkasira.\nNag-o-overheat kung masyadong maraming pinsala ang natamo. Opsyonal na gumagamit ng coolant upang maiwasan ang sobrang init. Maaaring gamitin ang phase fabric upang madagdagan ang laki ng kalasag.
bundle_fil.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Pinipinsala ang mga kaaway na tumuntong sa minahan. Halos hindi nakikita ng kalaban.
bundle_fil.properties.block.conveyor.description: Pangunahing block ng transportasyon ng item. Inililipat ang mga item pasulong at awtomatikong idedeposito ang mga ito sa mga bloke. Naiikot.
bundle_fil.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced na block ng transportasyon ng item. Inilipat ang mga item nang mas mabilis kaysa sa mga karaniwang conveyor.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Naglilipat ng mga item sa mga batch.\nTinatanggap ang mga item sa likod, at ibinababa ang mga ito sa tatlong direksyon sa harap.
bundle_fil.properties.block.junction.description: Nagsisilbing tulay para sa dalawang tumatawid na conveyor belt. Kapaki-pakinabang sa mga sitwasyon na may dalawang magkaibang conveyor na nagdadala ng magkaibang mga materyales sa magkaibang lokasyon.
bundle_fil.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced na block ng transportasyon ng item. Nagbibigay-daan sa pagdadala ng mga item sa hanggang 3 tile ng anumang lupain o gusali.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced na block ng transportasyon ng item. Gumagamit ng kuryente para mag-teleport ng mga item sa isang konektadong phase conveyor sa ilang tile.
bundle_fil.properties.block.sorter.description: Pag-uuri ng mga item. Kung ang isang item ay tumugma sa pagpili, ito ay pinapayagang makapasa. Kung hindi, ang item ay nai-output sa kaliwa at kanan.
bundle_fil.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Pinoproseso ang mga item tulad ng isang karaniwang sorter, ngunit sa halip ay naglalabas ng mga napiling item sa mga gilid.
bundle_fil.properties.block.router.description: Tumatanggap ng mga item, pagkatapos ay i-output ang mga ito sa hanggang 3 iba pang direksyon nang pantay. Kapaki-pakinabang para sa paghahati ng mga materyales mula sa isang pinagmulan patungo sa maraming target.\n\n[scarlet]Huwag gumamit sa tabi ng mga production input, dahil mababara ang mga ito ng output.[]
bundle_fil.properties.block.router.details: A necessary evil. Using next to production inputs is not advised, as they will get clogged by output.
bundle_fil.properties.block.distributor.description: Isang advanced na router. Hinahati ang mga item sa hanggang 7 iba pang direksyon nang pantay.
bundle_fil.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Mga output lamang sa kaliwa at kanan kung ang harap na landas ay naka-block.
bundle_fil.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: Ang kabaligtaran ng isang overflow gate. Mga output sa harap kung ang kaliwa at kanang mga landas ay naharang.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ang pinakahuling block ng transportasyon ng item. Nangongolekta ng ilang mga item at pagkatapos ay kukunan ang mga ito sa isa pang mass driver sa mahabang hanay. Nangangailangan ng kuryente upang gumana.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Isang murang bomba na may mabagal na output, ngunit walang pagkonsumo ng kuryente.
bundle_fil.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Isang advanced na bomba. Nagbomba ng mas maraming likido, ngunit nangangailangan ng kapangyarihan.
bundle_fil.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle_fil.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_fil.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-container.description: Stores a sizeable amount of liquid. Outputs to all sides, similarly to a liquid router.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_fil.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_fil.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_fil.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range.
bundle_fil.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_fil.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_fil.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle_fil.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_fil.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_fil.properties.block.steam-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle_fil.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_fil.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle_fil.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_fil.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle_fil.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_fil.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_fil.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle_fil.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle_fil.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle_fil.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_fil.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle_fil.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle_fil.properties.block.cultivator.details: Recovered technology. Used to produce massive amounts of biomass as efficiently as possible. Likely the initial incubator of the spores now covering Serpulo.
bundle_fil.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle_fil.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_fil.properties.block.core-shard.details: The first iteration. Compact. Self-replicating. Equipped with single-use launch thrusters. Not designed for interplanetary travel.
bundle_fil.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_fil.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_fil.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_fil.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_fil.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from any nearby non-transportation block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle_fil.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle_fil.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_fil.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead, scrap or metaglass flak at enemy units.
bundle_fil.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_fil.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_fil.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle_fil.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle_fil.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle_fil.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range shrapnel turret. Fires three piercing blasts at nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely powerful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle_fil.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle_fil.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle_fil.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle_fil.properties.block.foreshadow.description: Fires a large single-target bolt over long distances. Prioritizes enemies with higher max health.
bundle_fil.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_fil.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.
bundle_fil.properties.block.parallax.description: Fires a tractor beam that pulls in air targets, damaging them in the process.
bundle_fil.properties.block.tsunami.description: Fires powerful streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_fil.properties.block.silicon-crucible.description: Refines silicon from sand and coal, using pyratite as an additional heat source. More efficient in hot locations.
bundle_fil.properties.block.disassembler.description: Separates slag into trace amounts of exotic mineral components at low efficiency. Can produce thorium.
bundle_fil.properties.block.overdrive-dome.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings. Requires phase fabric and silicon to operate.
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-conveyor.description: Moves large payloads, such as units from factories.
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-router.description: Splits input payloads into 3 output directions.
bundle_fil.properties.block.command-center.description: Controls unit behavior with several different commands.
bundle_fil.properties.block.ground-factory.description: Produces ground units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_fil.properties.block.air-factory.description: Produces air units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_fil.properties.block.naval-factory.description: Produces naval units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_fil.properties.block.additive-reconstructor.description: Upgrades inputted units to the second tier.
bundle_fil.properties.block.multiplicative-reconstructor.descr: Upgrades inputted units to the third tier.
bundle_fil.properties.block.exponential-reconstructor.descript: Upgrades inputted units to the fourth tier.
bundle_fil.properties.block.tetrative-reconstructor.descriptio: Upgrades inputted units to the fifth and final tier.
bundle_fil.properties.block.switch.description: A toggleable switch. State can be read and controlled with logic processors.
bundle_fil.properties.block.micro-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings.
bundle_fil.properties.block.logic-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the micro processor.
bundle_fil.properties.block.hyper-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the logic processor.
bundle_fil.properties.block.memory-cell.description: Stores information for a logic processor.
bundle_fil.properties.block.memory-bank.description: Stores information for a logic processor. High capacity.
bundle_fil.properties.block.logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_fil.properties.block.large-logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_fil.properties.block.interplanetary-accelerator.descrip: A massive electromagnetic railgun tower. Accelerates cores to escape velocity for interplanetary deployment.
bundle_fil.properties.block.repair-turret.description: Continuously repairs the closest damaged unit in its vicinity. Optionally accepts coolant.
bundle_fil.properties.block.payload-propulsion-tower.descripti: Long-range payload transport structure. Shoots payloads to other linked payload propulsion towers.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.dagger.description: Fires standard bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.mace.description: Fires streams of flame at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.fortress.description: Fires long-range artillery at ground targets.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.scepter.description: Fires a barrage of charged bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.reign.description: Fires a barrage of massive piercing bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.nova.description: Fires laser bolts that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.pulsar.description: Fires arcs of electricity that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.quasar.description: Fires piercing laser beams that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight. Shielded.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.vela.description: Fires a massive continuous laser beam that damages enemies, causes fires and repairs allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.corvus.description: Fires a massive laser blast that damages enemies and repairs allied structures. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.crawler.description: Runs toward enemies and self-destructs, causing a large explosion.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.atrax.description: Fires debilitating orbs of slag at ground targets. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.spiroct.description: Fires sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.arkyid.description: Fires large sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.toxopid.description: Fires large electric cluster-shells and piercing lasers at enemies. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.flare.description: Fires standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.horizon.description: Drops clusters of bombs on ground targets.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.zenith.description: Fires salvos of missiles at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.antumbra.description: Fires a barrage of bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.eclipse.description: Fires two piercing lasers and a barrage of flak at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.mono.description: Automatically mines copper and lead, depositing it into the core.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.poly.description: Automatically rebuilds destroyed structures and assists other units in construction.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.mega.description: Automatically repairs damaged structures. Capable of carrying blocks and small ground units.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.quad.description: Drops large bombs on ground targets, repairing allied structures and damaging enemies. Capable of carrying medium-sized ground units.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.oct.description: Protects nearby allies with its regenerating shield. Capable of carrying most ground units.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.risso.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.minke.description: Fires shells and standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.bryde.description: Fires long-range artillery shells and missiles at enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.sei.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and armor-piercing bullets at enemies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.omura.description: Fires a long-range piercing railgun bolt at enemies. Constructs flare units.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.alpha.description: Defends the Shard core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.beta.description: Defends the Foundation core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.gamma.description: Defends the Nucleus core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.retusa.description: Fires homing torpedoes at nearby enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.oxynoe.description: Fires structure-repairing streams of flame at nearby enemies. Targets nearby enemy projectiles with a point defense turret.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.cyerce.description: Fires seeking cluster-missiles at enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.aegires.description: Shocks all enemy units and structures that enter its energy field. Repairs all allies.
bundle_fil.properties.unit.navanax.description: Fires explosive EMP projectiles, dealing significant damage to enemy power networks and repairing allied structures. Melts nearby enemies with 4 autonomous laser turrets.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.read: Read a number from a linked memory cell.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.write: Write a number to a linked memory cell.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.print: Add text to the print buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Print Flush[] is used.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.draw: Add an operation to the drawing buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Draw Flush[] is used.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.drawflush: Flush queued [accent]Draw[] operations to a display.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.printflush: Flush queued [accent]Print[] operations to a message block.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.getlink: Get a processor link by index. Starts at 0.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.radar: Locate units around a building with range.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.sensor: Get data from a building or unit.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.end: Jump to the top of the instruction stack.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.wait: Wait a certain number of seconds.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.lookup: Look up an item/liquid/unit/block type by ID.\nTotal counts of each type can be accessed with:\n[accent]@unitCount[] / [accent]@itemCount[] / [accent]@liquidCount[] / [accent]@blockCount[]
bundle_fil.properties.lst.unitbind: Bind to the next unit of a type, and store it in [accent]@unit[].
bundle_fil.properties.lst.unitradar: Locate units around the currently bound unit.
bundle_fil.properties.lst.unitlocate: Locate a specific type of position/building anywhere on the map.\nRequires a bound unit.
bundle_fil.properties.logic.nounitbuild: [red]Unit building logic is not allowed here.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.type: Type of building/unit.\ne.g. for any router, this will return [accent]@router[].\nNot a string.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.shootp: Shoot at a unit/building with velocity prediction.
bundle_fil.properties.laccess.controller: Unit controller. If processor controlled, returns processor.\nIf in a formation, returns leader.\nOtherwise, returns the unit itself.
bundle_fil.properties.laccess.dead: Whether a unit/building is dead or no longer valid.
bundle_fil.properties.laccess.controlled:
Returns:
[accent]@ctrlProcessor[] if unit controller is processor
[accent]@ctrlPlayer[] if unit/building controller is player
[accent]@ctrlFormation[] if unit is in formation
Otherwise, 0.
bundle_fil.properties.laccess.progress: Action progress, 0 to 1.\nReturns production, turret reload or construction progress.
bundle_fil.properties.graphicstype.clear: Fill the display with a color.
bundle_fil.properties.graphicstype.color: Set color for next drawing operations.
bundle_fil.properties.graphicstype.image: Draw an image of some content.\nex: [accent]@router[] or [accent]@dagger[].
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.equal: Equal. Coerces types.\nNon-null objects compared with numbers become 1, otherwise 0.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.strictequal: Strict equality. Does not coerce types.\nCan be used to check for [accent]null[].
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.spawn: Enemy spawn point.\nMay be a core or a position.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.resupply: Resupply points.\nOnly relevant when [accent]"Unit Ammo"[] is enabled.
bundle_fil.properties.radar.from: Building to sense from.\nSensor range is limited by building range.
bundle_fil.properties.radar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_fil.properties.unitradar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.idle: Don't move, but keep building/mining.\nThe default state.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.approach: Approach a position with a radius.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.targetp: Shoot a target with velocity prediction.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.itemtake: Take an item from a building.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.paytake: Pick up payload at current location.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.payenter: Enter/land on the payload block the unit is on.
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.getblock: Fetch a building and type at coordinates.\nUnit must be in range of position.\nSolid non-buildings will have the type [accent]@solid[].
bundle_fil.properties.lenum.within: Check if unit is near a position.

bundle_fr.properties.link.trello.description: Trello officiel pour les nouvelles fonctionnalités planifiées
bundle_fr.properties.link.itch.io.description: Page itch.io avec les différentes versions du jeu.
bundle_fr.properties.link.bug.description: Vous avez trouvé un bug ? Reportez-le ici
bundle_fr.properties.linkfail: L'ouverture du lien a échouée ! \nL'URL a été copiée dans votre presse-papier.
bundle_fr.properties.screenshot.invalid: Carte trop grande, potentiellement pas assez de mémoire pour la capture d'écran.
bundle_fr.properties.indev.notready: Cette partie du jeu n'est pas encore prête.
bundle_fr.properties.indev.campaign: [accent]Félicitations! Vous avez atteint la fin de la campagne ![]\n\nC'est ici que le contenu actuel s'arrête. Le voyage interplanétaire sera ajouté dans de futures mises à jour.
bundle_fr.properties.be.update: Une nouvelle version expérimentale est disponible:
bundle_fr.properties.be.update.confirm: Télécharger et Redémarrer le jeu maintenant ?
bundle_fr.properties.schematic.replace: Un schéma avec ce nom existe déjà. Voulez-vous le remplacer ?
bundle_fr.properties.schematic.exists: Un schéma avec ce nom existe déjà.
bundle_fr.properties.schematic.disabled: [scarlet]Schémas désactivés ![]\nVous n'êtes pas autorisés à utiliser des schémas sur cette [accent]carte[] ou dans ce [accent]serveur.
bundle_fr.properties.map.delete: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette carte ?"[accent]{0}[]" ?
bundle_fr.properties.nearpoint: [[ [scarlet]QUITTEZ LE POINT D'APPARITION ENNEMI IMMÉDIATEMENT[] ]\nannihilation imminente
bundle_fr.properties.feature.unsupported: Votre appareil ne prend pas en charge cette fonctionnalité.
bundle_fr.properties.mods.initfailed: [red]⚠[] L'instance précédente de Mindustry n’a pas pu s’initialiser. Cela a probablement été causé par des mods..\n\nPour éviter une boucle de crash, [red]tous les mods ont été désactivés.[]
bundle_fr.properties.mods.reloadexit: Le jeu va se fermer pour relancer les mods.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.delete.error: Impossible de supprimer le mod. Le fichier est probablement en cours d'utilisation.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.errors: Des erreurs se sont produites lors du chargement du contenu.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.noerrorplay: [scarlet]Vous avez des mods avec des erreurs.[] Désactivez les mods concernés ou corrigez les erreurs avant de jouer.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.nowdisabled: [scarlet]Le mod '{0}' a des dépendances manquantes: [accent]{1}\n[lightgray]Ces mods doivent d'abord être téléchargés.\nCe mod sera automatiquement désactivé.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.requiresrestart: Le jeu va maintenant se fermer pour appliquer les modifications du mod.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.jarwarn: [scarlet]Les mods JAR sont par nature peu sûrs.[]\nFaites en sorte d'importer ce mod depuis une source digne de confiance.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.item.remove: Cet objet fait partie du mod[accent] '{0}'[]. Pour le supprimer, désinstaller le mod en question.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.author: [lightgray]Auteur : [] {0}
bundle_fr.properties.mod.missing: Cette sauvegarde contient des mods que vous avez récemment mis à jour ou que vous avez désinstallés. Votre sauvegarde risque d'être corrompue. Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir l'importer ?\n[lightgray]Mods:\n{0}
bundle_fr.properties.mod.preview.missing: Avant de publier ce mod dans le Steam Workshop, vous devez ajouter une image servant d'aperçu.\nPlacez une image nommée [accent]preview.png[] dans le dossier du mod et réessayez.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.folder.missing: Seuls les mods sous forme de dossiers peuvent être publiés sur le Steam Workshop.\nPour convertir n'importe quel mod en un dossier, décompressez-le tout simplement dans un dossier et supprimez l'ancien zip, puis redémarrez votre jeu ou rechargez vos mods.
bundle_fr.properties.mod.scripts.disable: Votre appareil ne prend pas en charge les mods avec des scripts. Vous devez désactiver ces mods pour pouvoir jouer.
bundle_fr.properties.name: Nom :
bundle_fr.properties.unlock.incampaign: < Débloquer dans la campagne pour plus de détails >
bundle_fr.properties.research.legacy: Des données de recherche de la [accent]5.0[] ont été trouvées.\nVoulez-vous [accent]charger ces données[] ou [accent]les ignorer[] et recommencer la recherche dans la nouvelle campagne ? (recommandé)
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.kick: Vous avez été expulsé du serveur !
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.whitelist: Vous n'êtes pas sur liste blanche de ce serveur.
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.vote: Vous avez été expulsé à la suite d'un vote. Au revoir !
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.clientOutdated: Client obsolète !\nMettez votre jeu à jour !
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.serverOutdated: Serveur obsolète !\nDemandez à l'hôte de le mettre à jour !
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.banned: Vous avez été banni de ce serveur !
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.typeMismatch: Ce serveur n'est pas compatible avec votre version du jeu.
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.playerLimit: Ce serveur est complet. Attendez qu'une place se libère.
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: Vous avez été expulsé récemment.\nAttendez avant de vous reconnecter...
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.nameInUse: Il y a déjà quelqu'un avec\nce nom sur ce serveur.
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: Vous êtes déjà sur ce serveur !\nSe connecter avec deux comptes n'est pas permis !
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Ce serveur ne supporte pas les versions personnalisées (Custom builds). Téléchargez une version officielle.
bundle_fr.properties.server.kicked.serverRestarting: Le serveur est en train de redémarrer...
bundle_fr.properties.host.info:
Le bouton [accent]héberger[] héberge un serveur sur le port [scarlet]6567[].
N'importe qui sur le même [lightgray]réseau wifi ou local[] devrait pouvoir voir votre serveur dans sa liste de serveurs.

Si vous voulez que les gens puissent se connecter de n'importe où grâce à l'IP, [accent]une ouverture des ports[] est requise.

[lightgray]Note: Si quelqu'un éprouve des difficultés à se connecter à votre partie LAN, assurez-vous que vous avez autorisé Mindustry à accéder à votre réseau local dans les paramètres de votre pare-feu.
bundle_fr.properties.join.info:
Ici, vous pouvez entrer l'[accent]IP d'un serveur[] pour vous y connecter, ou découvrir les serveurs sur votre [accent]réseau local[] ou les serveurs [accent]globaux[].
Les parties multijoueur LAN et WAN sont toutes deux supportées.

[lightgray]Note: Si vous voulez vous connecter à un serveur par IP, vous devrez demander l'IP à l'hébergeur. Celle-ci peut-être trouvée en cherchant "Mon IP" sur un moteur de recherche depuis son appareil.
bundle_fr.properties.servers.disclaimer: Les serveurs communautaires ne sont [accent]pas[] gérés, ni contrôlés par le développeur.\n\nCes serveurs peuvent contenir du contenu qui ne convient pas à tous les âges.
bundle_fr.properties.invalidid: ID du client invalide ! Veuillez soumettre un rapport d'erreur.
bundle_fr.properties.server.delete: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce serveur ?
bundle_fr.properties.confirmunban: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir annuler le ban de ce joueur ?
bundle_fr.properties.confirmadmin: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir faire de "{0}[white]" un administrateur ?

bundle_fr.properties.sector.groundZero.description: Un endroit optimal pour commencer. Avec une menace ennemie faible et le peu de ressources disponibles, rassemblez autant de cuivre et de plomb que possible pour continuer votre exploration.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Même ici, près des montagnes, les spores se sont propagées. Les températures glaciales ne pourront pas les contenir indéfiniment.\n\nCommencez votre production d'énergie en construisant des générateurs à combustion et apprenez à utiliser les bâtiments de soin.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: À la périphérie du désert se trouvent les déserts de sel. Peu de ressources s'y trouvent.\n\nLà-bas, l'ennemi a construit un complexe de stockage de ressource. Détruisez leur Noyau et ne laissez rien debout.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.craters.description: Ce cratère est une relique d'anciennes guerres. De l'eau s'est accumulée au fond. Prenez le contrôle de la zone.\nCollectez du Sable et faites fondre du Verre trempé. Pompez de l'eau pour refroidir vos tourelles et vos foreuses.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Au-delà des déchets, se trouve le littoral. Autrefois, cet endroit abritait un réseau de défense côtière, mais il n’en reste pas grand-chose. Seules quelques structures de défense basiques sont restées intactes, tout le reste a été réduit en ferraille.\nContinuez votre exploration en redécouvrant la technologie.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Plus loin, à l’intérieur des terres, se trouvent des montagnes qui n'ont pas été touchées par les spores.
Exploitez le Titane présent en abondance dans cette zone et apprenez comment l'utiliser.

La présence ennemie est bien plus grande ici. Ne leur donnez pas le temps d’envoyer leurs unités les plus fortes.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: Étant plus proche de la source des spores, cette zone a été complètement envahie.\nL'ennemi y a établi un avant-poste. Formez des Titans et détruisez-le.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
La périphérie d’une zone de production de pétrole, située entre les montagnes et le désert. L’une des rares avec des réserves de goudron utilisables.
Bien qu’abandonnée, quelques forces ennemies dangereuses se trouvent à proximité. Ne les sous-estimez pas!

[lightgray]Recherchez la technologie de traitement de pétrole si possible.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: Une zone extrêmement dangereuse. Des ressources abondantes, mais peu d’espace. Un risque élevé de destruction donc partez dès que possible! Ne vous laissez surtout pas berner par le long temps d'attente entre les vagues ennemies. Vous risquez de le regretter.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
Une ancienne installation de production et de traitement de thorium, réduite en ruines.
[lightgray]Faites des recherches sur ce minerai et ses nombreuses utilisations.

L’ennemi est présent ici en grand nombre, recherchant constamment des attaquants.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: Une zone de transition entre les hautes montagnes et les terres plus basses, infestées de spores. Une petite base de reconnaissance ennemie se trouve ici.\nDétruisez les 2 Noyaux ennemis en utilisant des Poignards et des Rampeurs.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
L’origine des spores. Il s’agit de l’installation dans laquelle elles ont été étudiées et initialement produites.
Recherchez la technologie présente sur les lieux et cultivez des spores pour la production de carburant et de plastique.

[lightgray]Lors de la destruction de cette installation, les spores ont été libérées. Rien dans l’écosystème local ne pouvait concurrencer un organisme aussi envahissant.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Au-delà du rivage se trouve cette chaîne d’îles reculées. Les registres montrent qu’il y avait autrefois des usines de [accent]Plastanium[].\n\nDéfendez-vous contre les unités navales ennemies, établissez-y une base et faites des recherches sur ces usines.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: Un avant-poste éloigné, construit par l’ennemi dans le but de transférer des ressources vers d’autres secteurs.\n\nCette technologie de transport inter-secteur est essentielle pour de nouvelles conquêtes. Détruisez la base et recherchez leurs Rampes de lancement.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.impact0078.description: Ici reposent les vestiges d'un vaisseau de transport interstellaire, premier à être entré dans ce système.\n\nRécuperez et recherchez autant de technologies que possible dans cette épave.
bundle_fr.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
La cible finale.

Cette base côtière contient une structure capable de lancer des Noyaux sur les planètes voisines. Elle est extrêmement bien gardée.

Produisez des unités navales, éliminez l’ennemi le plus rapidement possible et recherchez la structure de lancement.
