bundle_nl.properties.hint.mine: Move near the \uf8c4 copper ore and [accent]tap[] it to mine manually.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.depositItems: To transfer items, drag from your ship to the core.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.respawn: To respawn as a ship, press [accent][[V][].
bundle_nl.properties.hint.respawn.mobile: You have switched control to a unit/structure. To respawn as a ship, [accent]tap the avatar in the top left.[]
bundle_nl.properties.hint.desktopPause: Press [accent][[Space][] to pause and unpause the game.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.placeDrill: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and click on a copper patch to place it.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.placeDrill.mobile: Select the \ue85e [accent]Drill[] tab in the menu at the bottom right, then select a \uf870 [accent]Drill[] and tap on a copper patch to place it.\n\nPress the \ue800 [accent]checkmark[] at the bottom right to confirm.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.placeConveyor:
Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a  [accent]Conveyor[] from the  [accent]Distribution[] tab.

Click and drag to place multiple conveyors.
[accent]Scroll[] to rotate.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.placeConveyor.mobile: Conveyors move items from drills into other blocks. Select a \uf896 [accent]Conveyor[] from the \ue814 [accent]Distribution[] tab.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to place multiple conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.placeTurret:
Place  [accent]Turrets[] to defend your base from enemies.

Turrets require ammo - in this case, copper.
Use conveyors and drills to supply them.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.breaking.mobile: Activate the \ue817 [accent]hammer[] in the bottom right and tap to break blocks.\n\nHold down your finger for a second and drag to break in a selection.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.blockInfo: View information of a block by selecting it in the [accent]build menu[], then selecting the [accent][[?][] button at the right.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.derelict: [accent]Derelict[] structures are broken remnants of old bases that no longer function.\n\nThese structures can be [accent]deconstructed[] for resources.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.research: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button to research new technology.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.research.mobile: Use the \ue875 [accent]Research[] button in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[] to research new technology.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.unitControl: Hold [accent][[L-ctrl][] and [accent]click[] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.unitControl.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] to control friendly units or turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.launch: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the bottom right.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.launch.mobile: Once enough resources are collected, you can [accent]Launch[] by selecting nearby sectors from the \ue827 [accent]Map[] in the \ue88c [accent]Menu[].
bundle_nl.properties.hint.schematicSelect: Hold [accent][[F][] and drag to select blocks to copy and paste.\n\n[accent][[Middle Click][] to copy a single block type.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind: Hold [accent][[L-Ctrl][] while dragging conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.conveyorPathfind.mobile: Enable \ue844 [accent]diagonal mode[] and drag conveyors to automatically generate a path.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.boost: Hold [accent][[L-Shift][] to fly over obstacles with your current unit.\n\nOnly a few ground units have boosters.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.command: Press [accent][[G][] to command nearby units of [accent]similar type[] into formation.\n\nTo command ground units, you must first control another ground unit.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.command.mobile: [accent][[Double-tap][] your unit to command nearby units into formation.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.payloadPickup: Press [accent][[[] to pick up small blocks or units.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.payloadPickup.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] a small block or unit to pick it up.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.payloadDrop.mobile: [accent]Tap and hold[] an empty location to drop a payload there.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.waveFire: [accent]Wave[] turrets with water as ammunition will automatically put out nearby fires.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.generator: \uf879 [accent]Combustion Generators[] burn coal and transmit power to adjacent blocks.\n\nPower transmission range can be extended with \uf87f [accent]Power Nodes[].
bundle_nl.properties.hint.guardian: [accent]Guardian[] units are armored. Weak ammo such as [accent]Copper[] and [accent]Lead[] is [scarlet]not effective[].\n\nUse higher tier turrets or \uf835 [accent]Graphite[] \uf861Duo/\uf859Salvo ammunition to take Guardians down.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.coreUpgrade: Cores can be upgraded by [accent]placing higher-tier cores over them[].\n\nPlace a \uf868 [accent]Foundation[] core over the \uf869 [accent]Shard[] core. Make sure it is free from nearby obstructions.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.presetLaunch: Gray [accent]landing zone sectors[], such as [accent]Frozen Forest[], can be launched to from anywhere. They do not require capture of nearby territory.\n\n[accent]Numbered sectors[], such as this one, are [accent]optional[].
bundle_nl.properties.hint.presetDifficulty: This sector has a [scarlet]high enemy threat level[].\nLaunching to such sectors is [accent]not recommended[] without proper technology and preparation.
bundle_nl.properties.hint.coreIncinerate: After the core is filled to capacity with an item, any extra items of that type it receives will be [accent]incinerated[].
bundle_nl.properties.hint.coopCampaign: When playing the [accent]co-op campaign[], items that are produced in the current map will also be sent [accent]to your local sectors[].\n\nAny new research done by the host also carries over.
bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.description: Een nuttig materiaal voor gebouwen. Wordt erg vaak in blokken gebruikt.
bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.details: Copper. Abnormally abundant metal on Serpulo. Structurally weak unless reinforced.
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.description: Een basismateriaal. Wordt veel gebruikt in elektronica en vloeistoftransport.
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.details: Dense. Inert. Extensively used in batteries.\nNote: Likely toxic to biological life forms. Not that there are many left here.
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.description: Een supersterke glas-samenstelling. Veel gebruikt voor vloeistof transport en opslag.
bundle_nl.properties.item.graphite.description: Gemineraliseerde koolstof, gebruikt voor ammunitie en elektrische isolatie.
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.details: Appears to be fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event.
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.details: Leftover remnants of old structures and units.
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.details: Spores. Likely a synthetic life form. Emit gases toxic to other biological life. Extremely invasive. Highly flammable in certain conditions.
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
bundle_nl.properties.block.armored-conveyor.description: Verplaatst items met dezelfde snelheid als een van titanium, maar heeft meer levenspunten. Accepteert alleen items van de zijkanten als het ook lopende banden zijn.
bundle_nl.properties.block.illuminator.description: Een kleine aanpasbare lamp, heeft stroom nodig.
bundle_nl.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_nl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cryofluid-mixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_nl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-conveyor.description: Moves items in batches.\nAccepts items at the back, and unloads them in three directions at the front.
bundle_nl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_nl.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_nl.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.router.details: A necessary evil. Using next to production inputs is not advised, as they will get clogged by output.
bundle_nl.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router that only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_nl.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-container.description: Stores a sizeable amount of liquid. Outputs to all sides, similarly to a liquid router.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.steam-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Genereert veel meer zonne-energie dan een normale zonnepaneel, maar is ook veel duurder om te bouwen.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Genereert super veel elektriciteit van radioactief thorium. Moet constant gekoeld worden. Als het oververhit raakt explodeert het met een grote knal. Genereert meer energie naarmate het voller zit, met normale productie op halve capaciteit.
bundle_nl.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates spores with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cultivator.details: Recovered technology. Used to produce massive amounts of biomass as efficiently as possible. Likely the initial incubator of the spores now covering Serpulo.
bundle_nl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-shard.details: The first iteration. Compact. Self-replicating. Equipped with single-use launch thrusters. Not designed for interplanetary travel.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[lightgray] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.foreshadow.description: Fires a large single-target bolt over long distances. Prioritizes enemies with higher max health.
bundle_nl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.segment.description: Damages and destroys incoming projectiles. Laser projectiles are not targeted.
bundle_nl.properties.block.parallax.description: Fires a tractor beam that pulls in air targets, damaging them in the process.
bundle_nl.properties.block.tsunami.description: Fires powerful streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle_nl.properties.block.silicon-crucible.description: Refines silicon from sand and coal, using pyratite as an additional heat source. More efficient in hot locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.disassembler.description: Separates slag into trace amounts of exotic mineral components at low efficiency. Can produce thorium.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overdrive-dome.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings. Requires phase fabric and silicon to operate.
bundle_nl.properties.block.payload-conveyor.description: Moves large payloads, such as units from factories.
bundle_nl.properties.block.payload-router.description: Splits input payloads into 3 output directions.
bundle_nl.properties.block.command-center.description: Controls unit behavior with several different commands.
bundle_nl.properties.block.ground-factory.description: Produces ground units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_nl.properties.block.air-factory.description: Produces air units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_nl.properties.block.naval-factory.description: Produces naval units. Output units can be used directly, or moved into reconstructors for upgrading.
bundle_nl.properties.block.additive-reconstructor.description: Upgrades inputted units to the second tier.
bundle_nl.properties.block.multiplicative-reconstructor.descr: Upgrades inputted units to the third tier.
bundle_nl.properties.block.exponential-reconstructor.descript: Upgrades inputted units to the fourth tier.
bundle_nl.properties.block.tetrative-reconstructor.descriptio: Upgrades inputted units to the fifth and final tier.
bundle_nl.properties.block.switch.description: A toggleable switch. State can be read and controlled with logic processors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.micro-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings.
bundle_nl.properties.block.logic-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the micro processor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.hyper-processor.description: Runs a sequence of logic instructions in a loop. Can be used to control units and buildings. Faster than the logic processor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.memory-cell.description: Stores information for a logic processor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.memory-bank.description: Stores information for a logic processor. High capacity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.large-logic-display.description: Displays arbitrary graphics from a logic processor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.interplanetary-accelerator.descrip: A massive electromagnetic railgun tower. Accelerates cores to escape velocity for interplanetary deployment.
bundle_nl.properties.block.repair-turret.description: Continuously repairs the closest damaged unit in its vicinity. Optionally accepts coolant.
bundle_nl.properties.block.payload-propulsion-tower.descripti: Long-range payload transport structure. Shoots payloads to other linked payload propulsion towers.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.dagger.description: Fires standard bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.mace.description: Fires streams of flame at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.fortress.description: Fires long-range artillery at ground targets.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.scepter.description: Fires a barrage of charged bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.reign.description: Fires a barrage of massive piercing bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.nova.description: Fires laser bolts that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.pulsar.description: Fires arcs of electricity that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.quasar.description: Fires piercing laser beams that damage enemies and repair allied structures. Capable of flight. Shielded.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.vela.description: Fires a massive continuous laser beam that damages enemies, causes fires and repairs allied structures. Capable of flight.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.corvus.description: Fires a massive laser blast that damages enemies and repairs allied structures. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.crawler.description: Runs toward enemies and self-destructs, causing a large explosion.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.atrax.description: Fires debilitating orbs of slag at ground targets. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.spiroct.description: Fires sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.arkyid.description: Fires large sapping laser beams at enemies, repairing itself in the process. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.toxopid.description: Fires large electric cluster-shells and piercing lasers at enemies. Can step over most terrain.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.flare.description: Fires standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.horizon.description: Drops clusters of bombs on ground targets.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.zenith.description: Fires salvos of missiles at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.antumbra.description: Fires a barrage of bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.eclipse.description: Fires two piercing lasers and a barrage of flak at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.mono.description: Automatically mines copper and lead, depositing it into the core.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.poly.description: Automatically rebuilds destroyed structures and assists other units in construction.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.mega.description: Automatically repairs damaged structures. Capable of carrying blocks and small ground units.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.quad.description: Drops large bombs on ground targets, repairing allied structures and damaging enemies. Capable of carrying medium-sized ground units.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.oct.description: Protects nearby allies with its regenerating shield. Capable of carrying most ground units.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.risso.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and bullets at all nearby enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.minke.description: Fires shells and standard bullets at nearby ground targets.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.bryde.description: Fires long-range artillery shells and missiles at enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.sei.description: Fires a barrage of missiles and armor-piercing bullets at enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.omura.description: Fires a long-range piercing railgun bolt at enemies. Constructs flare units.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.alpha.description: Defends the Shard core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.beta.description: Defends the Foundation core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.gamma.description: Defends the Nucleus core from enemies. Builds structures.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.retusa.description: Fires homing torpedoes at nearby enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.oxynoe.description: Fires structure-repairing streams of flame at nearby enemies. Targets nearby enemy projectiles with a point defense turret.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.cyerce.description: Fires seeking cluster-missiles at enemies. Repairs allied units.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.aegires.description: Shocks all enemy units and structures that enter its energy field. Repairs all allies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.navanax.description: Fires explosive EMP projectiles, dealing significant damage to enemy power networks and repairing allied structures. Melts nearby enemies with 4 autonomous laser turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.read: Read a number from a linked memory cell.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.write: Write a number to a linked memory cell.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.print: Add text to the print buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Print Flush[] is used.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.draw: Add an operation to the drawing buffer.\nDoes not display anything until [accent]Draw Flush[] is used.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.drawflush: Flush queued [accent]Draw[] operations to a display.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.printflush: Flush queued [accent]Print[] operations to a message block.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.getlink: Get a processor link by index. Starts at 0.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.radar: Locate units around a building with range.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.sensor: Get data from a building or unit.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.end: Jump to the top of the instruction stack.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.wait: Wait a certain number of seconds.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.lookup: Look up an item/liquid/unit/block type by ID.\nTotal counts of each type can be accessed with:\n[accent]@unitCount[] / [accent]@itemCount[] / [accent]@liquidCount[] / [accent]@blockCount[]
bundle_nl.properties.lst.unitbind: Bind to the next unit of a type, and store it in [accent]@unit[].
bundle_nl.properties.lst.unitradar: Locate units around the currently bound unit.
bundle_nl.properties.lst.unitlocate: Locate a specific type of position/building anywhere on the map.\nRequires a bound unit.
bundle_nl.properties.logic.nounitbuild: [red]Unit building logic is not allowed here.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.type: Type of building/unit.\ne.g. for any router, this will return [accent]@router[].\nNot a string.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.shootp: Shoot at a unit/building with velocity prediction.
bundle_nl.properties.laccess.controller: Unit controller. If processor controlled, returns processor.\nIf in a formation, returns leader.\nOtherwise, returns the unit itself.
bundle_nl.properties.laccess.dead: Whether a unit/building is dead or no longer valid.
bundle_nl.properties.laccess.controlled:
Returns:
[accent]@ctrlProcessor[] if unit controller is processor
[accent]@ctrlPlayer[] if unit/building controller is player
[accent]@ctrlFormation[] if unit is in formation
Otherwise, 0.
bundle_nl.properties.laccess.progress: Action progress, 0 to 1.\nReturns production, turret reload or construction progress.
bundle_nl.properties.graphicstype.clear: Fill the display with a color.
bundle_nl.properties.graphicstype.color: Set color for next drawing operations.
bundle_nl.properties.graphicstype.image: Draw an image of some content.\nex: [accent]@router[] or [accent]@dagger[].
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.equal: Equal. Coerces types.\nNon-null objects compared with numbers become 1, otherwise 0.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.strictequal: Strict equality. Does not coerce types.\nCan be used to check for [accent]null[].
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.spawn: Enemy spawn point.\nMay be a core or a position.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.resupply: Resupply points.\nOnly relevant when [accent]"Unit Ammo"[] is enabled.
bundle_nl.properties.radar.from: Building to sense from.\nSensor range is limited by building range.
bundle_nl.properties.radar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_nl.properties.unitradar.output: Variable to write output unit to.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.idle: Don't move, but keep building/mining.\nThe default state.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.approach: Approach a position with a radius.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.targetp: Shoot a target with velocity prediction.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.itemtake: Take an item from a building.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.paytake: Pick up payload at current location.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.payenter: Enter/land on the payload block the unit is on.
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.getblock: Fetch a building and type at coordinates.\nUnit must be in range of position.\nSolid non-buildings will have the type [accent]@solid[].
bundle_nl.properties.lenum.within: Check if unit is near a position.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.indev.campaign: [accent]Congratulations! You've reached the end of the campaign![]\n\nThis is as far as the content goes right now. Interplanetary travel will be added in future updates.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.mods.initfailed: [red]⚠[] The previous Mindustry instance failed to initialize. This was likely caused by misbehaving mods.\n\nTo prevent a crash loop, [red]all mods have been disabled.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mods.reloadexit: The game will now exit, to reload mods.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.preview.missing: Voordat je de mod publiceert moet je een afbeelding voor de voorvertoning toevoegen.\nPlaats een afbeelding met de naam[accent] preview.png[] in de modfolder.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.folder.missing: Mods kunnen enkel gepubliceerd worden in foldervorm.\nOm een mod in foldervorm te zetten exporteer je het modbestand uit de zipfile en verwijder je de oude zipfile. Herlaad vervolgens je mods of herstart het spel.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.host.info:
Ook de [accent]host[] knop hosts een server op poort [scarlet]6567[]. 
Iedereen die verbonden is met dezelfde [lightgray]wifi of lokaal netwerk[] zou je server moeten zien in zijn server lijst.

Als je wil dat personen kunnen verbinden met je server van ergens anders via IP. Dan is [accent]port forwarding[] is nodig.

[lightgray]Nota: Als iemand problemen heeft met het verbinden tot je LAN spel, zorg dan dat mindustry toestemming heeft tot je lokale netwerk in de Firewall instellingen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.join.info: Hier kan je een [accent]server IP[] invullen waarmee je wil verbinden. Je kan hier ook verbinden met servers op je [accent]lokale netwerk[]. LAN en WAN multiplayer wordt ondersteund.\n\n[lightgray]Belangrijk: er is geen automatische globale server lijst; als je met iemand wil verbinden via een IP adres moet je zijn/haar IP adres vragen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.hosts.none: [lightgray]Geen games op je lokale netwerk gevonden.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.servers.disclaimer: Community servers are [accent]not[] owned or controlled by the developer.\n\nServers may contain user-generated content that is not appropriate for all ages.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.biomassFacility.description:
The origin of spores. This is the facility in which they were researched and initially produced.
Research the technology contained within. Cultivate spores for the production of fuel and plastics.

[lightgray]Upon this facility's demise, the spores were released. Nothing in the local ecosystem could compete with such an invasive organism.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.windsweptIslands.description: Further past the shoreline is this remote chain of islands. Records show they once had [accent]Plastanium[]-producing structures.\n\nFend off the enemy's naval units. Establish a base on the islands. Research these factories.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.extractionOutpost.description: A remote outpost, constructed by the enemy for the purpose of launching resources to other sectors.\n\nCross-sector transport technology is essential for further conquest. Destroy the base. Research their Launch Pads.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.impact0078.description: Here lie remnants of the interstellar transport vessel that first entered this system.\n\nSalvage as much as possible from the wreckage. Research any intact technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.sector.planetaryTerminal.description:
The final target.

This coastal base contains a structure capable of launching Cores to local planets. It is extremely well guarded.

Produce naval units. Eliminate the enemy as quickly as possible. Research the launch structure.
